TReportSQL.select: SELECT IFNULL(crp.crp_name, 'NO harvest') as "Produce", base.grp_name as "Group name", base.cnt_epid as "EPID", base.cnt_longname as 'Farmer name', date_format(base.mem_start,"%d/%m/%Y") as 'Registered', date_format(min(har_date), "%d/%m/%Y") as 'First harvest date', date_format(max(har_date), "%d/%m/%Y") as 'Last harvest date', count(har_date) as 'Total collections', sum(har_amountdelivered) as 'Total delivery'
TReportSQL.from: FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT cnt.cnt_epid, cnt.cnt_longname, grp.grp_uri, grp.grp_name, IFNULL(min(ppm.ppm_date), mem.mem_start) as mem_start, cnt.cnt_uri FROM membership mem INNER JOIN `groups` grp ON mem.grp_uri = grp.grp_uri INNER JOIN contact cnt ON cnt.cnt_uri = mem.cnt_uri LEFT JOIN postponedpayment ppm ON ppm.cnt_uri = cnt.cnt_uri WHERE mem.mst_uri = 1 AND mem.mem_start <= NOW() AND ((mem.mem_end IS NULL) OR (mem.mem_end > NOW())) AND (( :org_uri = 0) OR (grp.grp_uri IN (SELECT DISTINCT ogm.grp_uri FROM orggroupmembership ogm WHERE (ogm.org_uri = :org_uri AND ogm.ogm_end IS NULL) ))) AND grp.grp_active = 1 GROUP BY cnt.cnt_epid, cnt.cnt_longname, grp.grp_uri, grp.grp_name, mem.mem_start, cnt.cnt_uri ) base LEFT JOIN harvest har ON base.cnt_uri = har.cnt_uri LEFT JOIN crop crp ON har.crp_uri = crp.crp_uri
TReportSQL.where: WHERE (1=1)
TReportSQL.groupby: GROUP BY crp.crp_name, base.cnt_epid, base.cnt_longname, base.grp_uri, base.grp_name, base.mem_start

TReportSQL.select: SELECT grp_code AS 'Group code', grp_officialname AS 'Group name', date(plantdate) 'Plant date', DATEDIFF(NOW(), plantdate) AS 'Days ago', count(*) AS 'Total farmers', count(startdate) AS 'Total Farmers started', count(*) - count(startdate) AS 'Farmers not started'
TReportSQL.from: FROM (SELECT grp.grp_code, grp.grp_officialname, tpl.cnt_uri, tpl.plantdate, har.startdate FROM `groups` grp INNER JOIN membership mst ON mst.grp_uri = grp.grp_uri INNER JOIN(SELECT tpl_date as plantdate, cnt_uri FROM transplanting tpl, field fld WHERE tpl.fld_uri = fld.fld_uri) tpl ON mst.cnt_uri = tpl.cnt_uri LEFT JOIN (SELECT min(har_date) startdate, cnt_uri FROM harvest GROUP BY cnt_uri) har ON har.cnt_uri = mst.cnt_uri WHERE grp.grp_active = 1 AND mst.mst_uri = 1 AND mst.mem_end IS NULL) base

TReportSQL.select: SELECT CAST( GROUP_CONCAT(mainsql._GROUPCODE) AS CHAR) AS 'Group code', CAST( GROUP_CONCAT(mainsql._GROUPNAME)) AS 'Group name', mainsql._EPID AS 'EPID', mainsql._FARMER AS 'Farmer name', mainsql._idnr AS 'National ID', mainsql._gender AS Gender, mainsql._phone AS 'Phone number', CAST( GROUP_CONCAT(mainsql._STARTED) AS 'Started'
TReportSQL.from: FROM (SELECT grp.grp_code as _GroupCode, grp.grp_officialname as _GroupName, cnt.cnt_epid as _epid, cnt.cnt_longname as _farmer, cnt.cnt_phone as _phone, IF(cnt.cnt_gender='U', null, cnt.cnt_gender) as _gender, IF( cnt.cnt_idnr='00000000', null, cnt.cnt_idnr) as _idnr, DATE_FORMAT(mbs.mem_start,'%Y%m%d') AS _started FROM membership mbs, contact cnt, `groups` grp WHERE mbs.grp_uri = grp.grp_uri and mbs.mst_uri=1 and IFNULL(grp.grp_active,0)=1 and mbs.cnt_uri = cnt.cnt_uri and (mbs.mem_end IS NULL or mbs.mem_end > NOW()) AND ( :org_uri =0 OR (mbs.grp_uri IN (SELECT ogm.grp_uri FROM orggroupmembership ogm WHERE ogm.org_uri= :org_uri ))) AND ( :grp_uri =0 OR (mbs.grp_uri =:grp_uri )) ORDER BY _GroupCode) mainsql
TReportSQL.groupby: GROUP BY mainsql._EPID, mainsql._FARMER, mainsql._PHONE, mainsql._GENDER, mainsql._IDNR

TReportSQL.select: SELECT DISTINCT CAST( GROUP_CONCAT(grp.GRP_OFFICIALNAME) AS CHAR) AS 'Group name', cnt.cnt_epid AS 'EPID', cnt.cnt_longname AS 'Farmer name', itm.itm_name as "Item name", isi.isi_code AS 'Issued item', iss.iss_date AS 'Issue date'
TReportSQL.from: FROM contact cnt INNER JOIN issueditem isi ON isi.CNT_URI = cnt.cnt_uri INNER JOIN itemissue iss ON iss.ISS_URI = isi.ISS_URI INNER JOIN item itm ON itm.itm_URI = iss.ITM_URI LEFT JOIN membership mem ON mem.CNT_URI = cnt.cnt_uri AND mst_uri = 1 AND mem.MEM_END IS NULL LEFT JOIN `groups` grp ON grp.GRP_URI = mem.GRP_URI
TReportSQL.where: WHERE isi.itr_uri IS NULL AND (iss.itm_uri = :itm_uri OR :itm_uri = 0) AND (( :org_uri = 0) OR (grp.grp_uri IN (SELECT DISTINCT ogm.grp_uri FROM orggroupmembership ogm WHERE (ogm.org_uri = :org_uri AND ogm.ogm_end IS NULL) )))

TReportSQL.select: SELECT crp.crp_name as 'Produce', count(distinct har.cnt_uri) as 'Total farmers', sum(har.har_amountdelivered) as 'Total delivery', DATE_FORMAT(min(har.har_date),'%Y%m%d') as 'Start date', DATE_FORMAT(max(har.har_date),'%Y%m%d') as 'End date'
TReportSQL.from: FROM harvest har INNER JOIN crop crp ON har.crp_uri=crp.crp_uri
TReportSQL.where: WHERE har.har_date >=:startdate and har.har_date < :enddate

TReportSQL.select: SELECT CAST( GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT grp.GRP_OFFICIALNAME) AS CHAR) AS 'Group name', cnt.cnt_epid AS 'EPID', cnt.cnt_longname AS 'Farmer name', cnt.cnt_idnr AS 'National ID', cnt.CNT_GENDER AS 'Gender', TRUNCATE(DATEDIFF(NOW(),cnt.CNT_DOB)/365,0) AS 'Age', cnt.cnt_province AS ADMINLEVEL1, cnt.cnt_district AS ADMINLEVEL2, cnt.cnt_division AS ADMINLEVEL3, cnt.cnt_location AS ADMINLEVEL4, cnt.CNT_CREATEDT AS 'Registration Date', (SELECT CAST(GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT psn.psn_longname) AS CHAR) FROM staffgrouprole sgr INNER JOIN personnel psn ON psn.psn_uri = sgr.psn_uri WHERE sgr.grp_uri=grp.grp_uri AND sgr.rtt_uri=1) AS 'Extension officer'
TReportSQL.from: FROM contact cnt left join membership mbs ON mbs.cnt_uri = cnt.cnt_uri AND mbs.mst_uri=1 left join `groups` grp ON mbs.grp_uri = grp.grp_uri AND mbs.mem_end IS NULL
TReportSQL.where: WHERE cnt_createdt BETWEEN :startdate AND :enddate AND ( grp.grp_uri = :grp_uri OR :grp_uri = 0 ) AND (( :org_uri = 0) OR (grp.grp_uri IN (SELECT DISTINCT ogm.grp_uri FROM orggroupmembership ogm WHERE (ogm.org_uri = :org_uri AND ogm.ogm_end IS NULL) )))

TReportSQL.select: SELECT grp_code as 'GroupCode', grp_name as 'Group Name', cnt_epid as EPid, cnt_longname as Farmer, plantdate 'Planting Date', firstharvest 'First Harvest', lastharvest 'Last Harvest', DATEDIFF(firstharvest, plantdate) 'Days Vegetative', daysprod 'Days Produced'
TReportSQL.from: FROM (SELECT grp.grp_code, grp.grp_name, cnt.cnt_epid, cnt.cnt_longname, ppm.cnt_uri, ppm.plantdate, min(ppm.firstharvest) as firstharvest, max(ppm.lastharvest) as lastharvest, DATEDIFF(max(ppm.lastharvest),min(ppm.firstharvest)) as daysprod FROM `groups` grp INNER JOIN membership mst ON mst.grp_uri = grp.grp_uri INNER JOIN contact cnt ON mst.cnt_uri = cnt.cnt_uri inner JOIN (SELECT date(min(tpl.tpl_date)) as plantdate, date(min(har.har_date)) as firstharvest, date(max(har.har_date)) as lastharvest, tpl.cnt_uri FROM (SELECT tpl_date, cnt_uri FROM transplanting tpl INNER JOIN field fld ON fld.fld_uri = tpl.fld_uri) tpl LEFT JOIN harvest har ON tpl.cnt_uri = har.cnt_uri group by tpl.cnt_uri) ppm ON mst.cnt_uri = ppm.cnt_uri WHERE mst.mst_uri = 1 AND grp.grp_active = 1 AND mst.mem_end IS NULL GROUP BY grp.grp_code, grp.grp_name, cnt_epid, cnt.cnt_longname, plantdate, ppm.cnt_uri) base
TReportSQL.groupby: GROUP BY grp_code, grp_name, cnt_epid, cnt_longname, plantdate, firstharvest, lastharvest, daysprod

TReportSQL.select: SELECT grp_code as 'Group code', grp_name as 'Group name', plantdate, firstharvest, IFNULL(DATEDIFF(firstharvest , plantdate),'not started') as daystillharvest, DATEDIFF(NOW(), plantdate) as daysfromplanting, count(*) as farmers
TReportSQL.from: FROM (SELECT grp.grp_code, grp.grp_name, ppm.cnt_uri, ppm.plantdate, min(ppm.firstharvest) as firstharvest FROM `groups` grp INNER JOIN membership mst ON mst.grp_uri = grp.grp_uri INNER JOIN (SELECT min(ppm_date) as plantdate, min(har.har_date) as firstharvest, ppminner.cnt_uri FROM harvest har INNER JOIN postponedpayment ppminner ON ppminner.cnt_uri = har.cnt_uri group by ppminner.cnt_uri) ppm ON mst.cnt_uri = ppm.cnt_uri WHERE mst.mst_uri = 1 AND grp.grp_active = 1 AND mst.mem_end IS NULL GROUP BY grp.grp_code, grp.grp_name, plantdate, ppm.cnt_uri) base
TReportSQL.groupby: GROUP BY grp_code, grp_name, plantdate, firstharvest

TReportSQL.select: SELECT CAST(GROUP_CONCAT( grp_code) AS CHAR) AS 'Group Code', CAST(GROUP_CONCAT( grp_name) AS CHAR) AS 'Group Name', cnt_epid AS 'EPID', Farmer, CAST(GROUP_CONCAT( FieldNumber) AS CHAR) 'Field Number', CAST(GROUP_CONCAT( FieldName) AS CHAR) 'Field Name', CAST(GROUP_CONCAT( crop) AS CHAR) Crop, CAST(GROUP_CONCAT(date(plantingdate)) AS CHAR) 'PLanting date', CAST(GROUP_CONCAT(fld_seeds_planted) AS CHAR) 'Seeds planted', sum(ppm_amount) 'Loan Amount', ' ' AS 'First Harvest' /* empty since collection production has not yet occurred */, CAST(GROUP_CONCAT( Days) AS CHAR) Days
TReportSQL.from: FROM ( SELECT cnt.cnt_uri, grp_code , grp_name , cnt_epid , cnt_longname AS Farmer, MAX(fld.fld_fieldno) FieldNumber, MAX(fld.fld_name) FieldName, crp_name Crop, if(MAX(fld.FLD_START) >= MAX(ppm.ppm_date), MAX(fld.FLD_START), MAX(ppm.ppm_date)) plantingdate, if(fld_seeds_planted=0,FLD_SIZE,fld_seeds_planted) /* note that seeds planted are sometimes populated in field size during expansion*/ AS fld_seeds_planted, sum(ppm.ppm_amount) ppm_amount, inner_.lastharvest, DATEDIFF(NOW(), min(ppm.ppm_date)) Days FROM contact cnt INNER JOIN membership mmb ON mmb.CNT_URI = cnt.CNT_URI AND mmb.MST_URI =1 INNER JOIN `groups` grp ON grp.GRP_URI = mmb.GRP_URI INNER JOIN postponedpayment ppm ON ppm.cnt_uri =cnt.cnt_uri INNER JOIN field fld ON fld.cnt_uri = cnt.cnt_uri INNER JOIN crop ON crop.crp_uri = fld.crp_uri INNER JOIN (SELECT har.cnt_uri, MAX(har.har_date) lastharvest FROM harvest har GROUP BY har.cnt_uri) inner_ ON inner_.cnt_uri = cnt.cnt_uri WHERE ppm.ppt_uri <> :CAUri /* dont show farmers' collection payment*/ AND (fld.FLD_END IS NULL AND fld.fld_estend >= NOW()) GROUP BY cnt.cnt_uri, grp.grp_uri, fld.fld_uri) base
TReportSQL.where: WHERE base.plantingdate >= /*last harvest*/ base.lastharvest /* only show ones whose harvests haven't occured after current planting season*/

TReportSQL.select: SELECT crp.crp_name as produce, grp_code as code, grp_officialname as groupname, plantdate, DATEDIFF(NOW(), plantdate) as daysago, count(*) as farmers, count(startdate) as "started production", count(*) - count(startdate) as "not started production"
TReportSQL.from: FROM ( SELECT grp.GRP_URI, grp.grp_code, grp.grp_officialname, tpl.cnt_uri, tpl.crp_uri, tpl.plantdate, har.startdate FROM `groups` grp INNER JOIN membership mst ON mst.grp_uri = grp.grp_uri INNER JOIN (SELECT tpl.tpl_date as plantdate, fld.crp_uri, fld.cnt_uri FROM transplanting tpl INNER JOIN field fld ON tpl.fld_uri = fld.fld_uri) tpl ON mst.cnt_uri = tpl.cnt_uri LEFT JOIN (SELECT min(har_date) startdate, cnt_uri, crp_uri FROM harvest GROUP BY cnt_uri, crp_uri) har ON har.cnt_uri = mst.cnt_uri and har.crp_uri=tpl.crp_uri WHERE grp.grp_active = 1 AND mst.mst_uri = 1 AND mst.mem_end IS NULL AND (( :org_uri = 0) OR (grp.grp_uri IN (SELECT DISTINCT ogm.grp_uri FROM orggroupmembership ogm WHERE (ogm.org_uri = :org_uri AND ogm.ogm_end IS NULL) ))) ) base INNER JOIN crop crp ON base.crp_uri=crp.crp_uri
TReportSQL.where: WHERE 1=1
TReportSQL.groupby: GROUP BY grp_code, grp_officialname, base.crp_uri, plantdate

TReportSQL.select: SELECT grp.grp_officialname 'Group Name', cnt.cnt_epid 'EPID', cnt.cnt_shortname 'Farmer', crp_name Crop, fld.fld_fieldno 'Field Number', fld.fld_name 'Field Name', plt.plt_desc 'Planting type', date(IFNULL(if(tpl.tpl_date >= fld_start, fld_start, tpl.tpl_date), fld_start)) 'Planting date', ifnull(if(tpl.tpl_amount <= 1 AND fld.fld_seeds_planted <> 0, fld.fld_seeds_planted, tpl.tpl_amount), fld.fld_seeds_planted) 'Amount planted', fst.fst_name 'Field Status', date(fsd.fsd_start) 'Field Start'
TReportSQL.from: FROM membership mem INNER JOIN `groups` grp ON mem.grp_uri = grp.grp_uri INNER JOIN contact cnt ON cnt.cnt_uri = mem.cnt_uri INNER JOIN field fld ON fld.cnt_uri = cnt.cnt_uri INNER JOIN crop ON crop.crp_uri = fld.crp_uri LEFT JOIN transplanting tpl ON tpl.fld_uri = fld.fld_uri LEFT JOIN plantingtype plt ON tpl.plt_uri = plt.plt_uri INNER JOIN fst_fld fsd ON fld.fld_uri = fsd.fld_uri INNER JOIN fieldstatus fst ON fsd.fst_uri = fst.fst_uri
TReportSQL.where: WHERE grp.grp_active = 1 AND mem.mst_uri = 1 AND mem.mem_end IS NULL AND fld.crp_uri = 1 AND fld.fld_end IS NULL AND fsd.fsd_active = 1

TReportSQL.select: SELECT grp.grp_officialname AS "Group name", iss.iss_date 'Issue date', itm.itm_name as "Item name", count(*) as 'Issued Items'
TReportSQL.from: FROM issueditem isi INNER JOIN itemissue iss ON isi.iss_uri = iss.iss_uri INNER JOIN membership mem ON isi.cnt_uri = mem.cnt_uri INNER JOIN `groups` grp ON mem.grp_uri = grp.grp_uri INNER JOIN item itm ON itm.itm_uri = iss.itm_uri
TReportSQL.where: WHERE isi.itr_uri IS NULL AND mem.mem_end IS NULL AND mem.mst_uri = 1 AND (iss.itm_uri = :itm_uri OR :itm_uri = 0 )

TReportSQL.select: SELECT CAST( GROUP_CONCAT( IST.Group) AS CHAR) AS "Group name", IST.cnt_epid 'EPID', IST.cnt_longname 'Farmer name', IST.Trays 'Issued items', IST.IssueDate 'Issue date'
TReportSQL.from: From ( SELECT grp.grp_officialname AS "Group", cnt.cnt_epid AS "cnt_epid", cnt.cnt_longname AS "cnt_longname", iss.iss_date AS "Issuedate", count(*) as trays FROM issueditem isi INNER JOIN itemissue iss ON isi.iss_uri = iss.iss_uri LEFT JOIN contact cnt ON cnt.cnt_uri = isi.cnt_uri LEFT JOIN membership mem ON isi.cnt_uri = mem.cnt_uri AND mem.mst_uri = 1 AND mem.mem_end IS NULL LEFT JOIN `groups` grp ON mem.grp_uri = grp.grp_uri WHERE isi.itr_uri IS NULL AND (iss.itm_uri = :itm_uri OR :itm_uri = 0 ) GROUP BY grp.grp_officialname, cnt.cnt_epid, cnt.cnt_longname, iss.iss_date ORDER BY grp.grp_officialname, cnt.cnt_longname ) IST
TReportSQL.where: WHERE (1=1)
TReportSQL.groupby: GROUP BY IST.cnt_epid, IST.cnt_longname, IST.IssueDate, IST.Trays

TReportSQL.select: SELECT crp.crp_name as 'Produce', base.grp_name AS 'Group name', base.cnt_epid AS 'EPID', base.cnt_longname AS 'Farmer name', base.mem_start AS 'Transplanting date', DATE(min(har_date)) as 'First harvest date', DATE(max(har_date)) AS 'Last harvest date', count(har_date) as 'Harvest count', sum(har_amountdelivered) as 'Total delivery'
TReportSQL.from: FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT cnt.cnt_epid, cnt.cnt_longname, grp.grp_name, IFNULL(min(ppm.ppm_date),mem.mem_start) as mem_start, cnt.cnt_uri, grp.grp_uri FROM membership mem INNER JOIN `groups` grp ON mem.grp_uri = grp.grp_uri INNER JOIN contact cnt ON cnt.cnt_uri = mem.cnt_uri LEFT JOIN postponedpayment ppm ON ppm.cnt_uri = cnt.cnt_uri WHERE mem.mst_uri = 1 AND mem.mem_start <= NOW() AND ((mem.mem_end IS NULL) or (mem.mem_end > NOW())) AND (( :org_uri = 0) OR (grp.grp_uri IN (SELECT DISTINCT ogm.grp_uri FROM orggroupmembership ogm WHERE (ogm.org_uri = :org_uri AND ogm.ogm_end IS NULL) ))) AND grp.grp_active = 1 GROUP BY cnt.cnt_epid, cnt.cnt_longname, grp.grp_name, mem.mem_start, cnt.cnt_uri, grp.grp_uri) base LEFT JOIN harvest har ON base.cnt_uri = har.cnt_uri LEFT JOIN crop crp ON har.crp_uri=crp.crp_uri
TReportSQL.where: WHERE (base.grp_uri = :grp_uri OR :grp_uri = 0) AND (har.crp_uri = :crp_uri OR :crp_uri = 0) AND har.har_date between :startdate AND :enddate
TReportSQL.groupby: GROUP BY crp.crp_name, base.cnt_epid, base.cnt_longname, base.grp_name, base.mem_start
TReportSQL.orderby: ORDER BY 9 DESC, crp.crp_name, base.grp_name, base.cnt_longname

TReportSQL.select: SELECT ppt.ppt_desc as "Loan type", grp.grp_code as "Group code", grp.grp_name as "Group name", count(distinct mem.cnt_uri) as "Farmers", count(distinct ppm.ppm_number) as "Loans", min(ppm.ppm_date) as "First opened", max(ppm.ppm_date) as "Last opened", IFNULL(DATE_FORMAT(max(ppm.ppm_lastrepayment),'%d/%m/%Y'),'never') as "Last repayed", sum(ppm.ppm_amount) as "Total amount", sum(ppm.ppm_amount)-sum(ppm.ppm_balance) as "Repayed amount", sum(ppm.ppm_balance) as "Amount open"
TReportSQL.from: FROM postponedpayment ppm INNER JOIN postponedpaymenttype ppt ON ppm.ppt_uri=ppt.ppt_uri INNER JOIN membership mem ON mem.cnt_uri=ppm.cnt_uri INNER JOIN `groups` grp ON grp.grp_uri = mem.grp_uri
TReportSQL.where: WHERE mem.mst_uri = 1 AND mem.mem_start <= NOW() AND ((mem.mem_end IS NULL) OR (mem.mem_end > NOW())) AND grp.grp_active = 1 AND mem.mem_end is null AND mem.mst_uri=1 AND ppt.ppt_uri <> :CAUri AND (ppt.ppt_uri = :ppt_uri OR :ppt_uri = 0) AND (( :org_uri = 0) OR (grp.grp_uri IN (SELECT DISTINCT ogm.grp_uri FROM orggroupmembership ogm WHERE (ogm.org_uri = :org_uri AND ogm.ogm_end IS NULL) )))

TReportSQL.select: SELECT crp.crp_name AS Produce, DATE_FORMAT(gpc.gpc_date, '%x-%v') as 'Week number', DATE_FORMAT(gpc.gpc_date, '%v') as 'week', DATE_FORMAT(gpc.gpc_date, '%x') as 'year', min(gpc.gpc_date) as 'Collection date', count(*) as 'Total collections', count(DISTINCT har.cnt_uri) as 'Total farmers', max(har.har_amountdelivered) as 'Max delivery', round(avg(har.har_amountdelivered),1) as 'Avg delivery', sum(har.har_amountdelivered) as 'Total delivery'
TReportSQL.from: FROM harvest har INNER JOIN groupcollection gpc ON gpc.gpc_uri = har.gpc_uri INNER JOIN crop crp ON crp.crp_uri = har.crp_uri INNER JOIN `groups` grp ON grp.grp_uri = gpc.grp_uri
TReportSQL.where: WHERE (( :org_uri = 0) OR (grp.grp_uri IN (SELECT DISTINCT ogm.grp_uri FROM orggroupmembership ogm WHERE (ogm.org_uri = :org_uri AND ogm.ogm_end IS NULL) )))

TReportSQL.select: SELECT crp.crp_name AS Produce, grp.grp_officialname as 'Group name', psn.psn_name as 'Extension officer', MIN(gpc.gpc_date) as 'Collection date', DATE_FORMAT(gpc.gpc_date,'%x-%v') as 'Week number', count(*) as 'Total collections', count(DISTINCT har.cnt_uri) as 'Total farmers', max(har.har_amountdelivered) as 'Max delivery', round(avg(har.har_amountdelivered),1) as 'Avg delivery', sum(har.har_amountdelivered) as 'Total delivery'
TReportSQL.from: FROM harvest har INNER JOIN crop crp ON har.crp_uri = crp.crp_uri INNER JOIN groupcollection gpc ON gpc.gpc_uri = har.gpc_uri INNER JOIN trip trp ON trp.trp_uri = gpc.TRP_URI INNER JOIN `groups` grp ON grp.grp_uri = gpc.grp_uri LEFT JOIN personnel psn ON trp.psn_uri = psn.psn_uri
TReportSQL.where: WHERE (crp.crp_uri = :crp_uri OR :crp_uri = 0) AND (grp.grp_uri = :grp_uri OR :grp_uri = 0) AND gpc.gpc_date between :startdate AND :enddate AND ( grp.grp_uri = :grp_uri OR :grp_uri = 0 ) AND (( :org_uri = 0) OR (grp.grp_uri IN (SELECT DISTINCT ogm.grp_uri FROM orggroupmembership ogm WHERE (ogm.org_uri = :org_uri AND ogm.ogm_end IS NULL) )))
TReportSQL.groupby: GROUP BY crp.crp_name, grp.grp_officialname, psn.psn_name, DATE_FORMAT(gpc.gpc_date,'%x-%v')

TReportSQL.select: SELECT DISTINCT crp.crp_name Produce, clr.clr_name 'Collection route', har.maxhar as 'Max delivery', DATE_FORMAT(har.har_date, '%d/%m/%Y') as 'Harvest date', grp.grp_officialname 'Group name', cnt.cnt_epid 'EPID', cnt.cnt_longname 'Farmer name'
TReportSQL.from: FROM (SELECT harm.crp_uri, harm.cnt_uri, harm.maxhar, har.har_date, har.gpc_uri, har.har_uri FROM (SELECT har.crp_uri, har.cnt_uri, max(har_amountdelivered) AS maxhar FROM harvest har, crop crp WHERE har.crp_uri = crp.crp_uri AND (crp.crp_uri = :crp_uri or :crp_uri = 0) AND -- produce filter ( DATE_FORMAT( har.har_date, '%x%v') between DATE_FORMAT( :startdate, '%x%v') and DATE_FORMAT( :enddate, '%x%v') ) -- date filter GROUP BY har.crp_uri, har.cnt_uri) harm, harvest har WHERE har.har_amountdelivered = harm.maxhar AND har.cnt_uri = harm.cnt_uri and har.crp_uri=harm.crp_uri) har, groupcollection gpc, crop crp, groupcropcollectionroute gccr, `groups` grp, contact cnt, collectionroute clr
TReportSQL.where: WHERE gpc.grp_uri = grp.grp_uri AND crp.crp_uri = gpc.crp_uri AND har.cnt_uri = cnt.cnt_uri AND har.crp_uri = crp.crp_uri AND gccr.grp_uri = gpc.grp_uri AND gpc.gpc_uri = har.gpc_uri AND clr.clr_uri = gccr.clr_uri AND (crp.crp_uri = :crp_uri or :crp_uri = 0) AND -- produce filter (grp.grp_uri = :grp_uri or :grp_uri = 0) AND -- group filter ( DATE_FORMAT( har.har_date, '%x%v') between DATE_FORMAT( :startdate, '%x%v') and DATE_FORMAT( :enddate, '%x%v') ) -- date filter AND ( grp.grp_uri = :grp_uri OR :grp_uri = 0 ) AND (( :org_uri = 0) OR (grp.grp_uri IN (SELECT DISTINCT ogm.grp_uri FROM orggroupmembership ogm WHERE (ogm.org_uri = :org_uri AND ogm.ogm_end IS NULL) )))
TReportSQL.orderby: ORDER BY crp.crp_name, clr.clr_name, har.maxhar DESC, DATE_FORMAT(har.har_date, '%d/%m/%Y'), cnt.cnt_longname

TReportSQL.select: SELECT crp.crp_name AS Produce, details.route 'Collection route', details.groupname 'Group name', details.weeknum 'Week number', details.farmers 'Total farmers', details.maxkg 'Max delivery', details.avgkg 'Avg delivery', details.totalkg 'Total delivery'
TReportSQL.from: FROM (select har.crp_uri, grp.grp_uri, gccr.clr_uri, clr.clr_name as route, grp.grp_officialname as groupname, DATE_FORMAT(gpc.gpc_date,'%x-%v') as weeknum, count(*) as farmers, max(har.har_amountdelivered) as maxkg, round(avg(har.har_amountdelivered),1) as avgkg, sum(har.har_amountdelivered) as totalkg from harvest har, groupcollection gpc, groupcropcollectionroute gccr, `groups` grp, collectionroute clr, cropcollectionroute ccr where grp.grp_uri = gpc.grp_uri AND gpc.gpc_uri = har.gpc_uri AND gccr.grp_uri = grp.grp_uri AND ccr.clr_uri = clr.clr_uri AND clr.clr_uri = gccr.clr_uri AND gpc.gpc_date BETWEEN :startdate AND :enddate AND (grp.grp_uri = :grp_uri or :grp_uri = 0) AND (har.crp_uri = :crp_uri or :crp_uri = 0) AND clr.clr_active = 1 AND ccr.ccr_active = 1 AND gccr.gccr_active =1 AND ( grp.grp_uri = :grp_uri OR :grp_uri = 0 ) AND (( :org_uri = 0) OR (grp.grp_uri IN (SELECT DISTINCT ogm.grp_uri FROM orggroupmembership ogm WHERE (ogm.org_uri = :org_uri AND ogm.ogm_end IS NULL) ))) group by har.crp_uri, gccr.clr_uri, clr.clr_name, grp.grp_officialname, grp.grp_uri, DATE_FORMAT(gpc.gpc_date,'%x-%v') having count(*) >= 5) details, (SELECT crp_uri, groupname, max(avgkg) as avgkg FROM (select har.crp_uri, gccr.clr_uri as route, grp.grp_officialname as groupname, DATE_FORMAT(gpc.gpc_date,'%x%v') as weeknum, count(*) as farmers, max(har.har_amountdelivered) as maxkg, round(avg(har.har_amountdelivered),1) as avgkg, sum(har.har_amountdelivered) as totalkg from harvest har, groupcollection gpc, groupcropcollectionroute gccr, `groups` grp where grp.grp_uri = gpc.grp_uri AND gpc.gpc_uri = har.gpc_uri AND gccr.grp_uri = grp.grp_uri AND gpc.gpc_date BETWEEN :startdate AND :enddate AND (grp.grp_uri = :grp_uri or :grp_uri = 0) AND (har.crp_uri = :crp_uri or :crp_uri = 0) AND gccr.gccr_active =1 AND ( grp.grp_uri = :grp_uri OR :grp_uri = 0 ) AND (( :org_uri = 0) OR (grp.grp_uri IN (SELECT DISTINCT ogm.grp_uri FROM orggroupmembership ogm WHERE (ogm.org_uri = :org_uri AND ogm.ogm_end IS NULL) ))) group by har.crp_uri, gccr.clr_uri, grp.grp_officialname, DATE_FORMAT(gpc.gpc_date,'%x%v') having count(*) >= 5) sub1 GROUP BY crp_uri, groupname) maxi, crop crp
TReportSQL.where: WHERE maxi.groupname = details.groupname AND maxi.avgkg = details.avgkg and maxi.crp_uri=details.crp_uri AND crp.crp_uri=details.crp_uri AND (details.grp_uri = :grp_uri or :grp_uri = 0) AND (maxi.crp_uri = :crp_uri or :crp_uri = 0)
TReportSQL.orderby: order by crp.crp_name, details.route, details.avgkg desc, details.weeknum desc

TReportSQL.select: SELECT DISTINCT DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%d/%m/%Y') AS "DATE", grp_officialname AS "GROUP", bnk_id AS "BANK CODE", bnk_branchid AS "BRANCH CODE", bnk_number AS "ACCOUNT NUMBER", bnk_accountname AS "NAME", sum(clp_totalamount) AS "AMOUNT", CONCAT(:prefix, clp_reference) AS "REF"
TReportSQL.from: FROM bankaccount bnk INNER JOIN ( SELECT DISTINCT grp.bnk_uri, grp_officialname, clp_reference, clp_totalamount from groupcollectionpayment gcp INNER JOIN collectionpayment clp ON clp.clp_uri = gcp.clp_uri INNER JOIN groupcollection gpc ON gcp.GPC_URI = gpc.GPC_URI INNER JOIN `groups` grp ON grp.grp_uri = gpc.GRP_URI WHERE IFNULL(clp_transferred, 0) = 0 ) b ON b.bnk_uri = bnk.bnk_uri

TReportSQL.select: SELECT crp.crp_name as 'Produce', DATE_FORMAT(har.har_date,'%x-%v') 'Week number', sum(har.har_amountdelivered) 'Total delivery', sum(har.har_amountpaid) 'Delivery paid', sum(har.har_paid) 'Amount paid', FORMAT(har.har_price,sp54.decim) 'Average paid', round(sum(har.har_paid) / sum(har.har_amountpaid),sp54.decim) 'Average price', ROUND(((sum(har.har_amountdelivered) - sum(har.har_amountpaid))/sum(har.har_amountdelivered))* 100,2) 'Percentage rejected', IFNULL(sum(b.rpm_amount) ,0) 'Repayed', (sum(har.har_paid)-IFNULL(sum(b.rpm_amount) ,0)) AS 'Nett paid', ROUND(((SUM(har.har_paid)-IFNULL(sum(b.rpm_amount) ,0)) /sum(har.har_amountdelivered)),sp54.decim) AS 'Nett price', ROUND((sum(har.har_amountpaid)/sum(har.har_amountdelivered))*100,2) AS 'Percentage paid'
TReportSQL.from: FROM harvest har INNER JOIN crop crp ON crp.crp_uri = har.crp_uri INNER JOIN (SELECT CAST(sp.sys_value AS UNSIGNED) as decim FROM sysparams sp WHERE sp.sys_uri = 54) sp54 LEFT JOIN ( SELECT hxr.har_uri, sum(rpm.rpm_amount) rpm_amount FROM har_x_rpm hxr INNER JOIN repayment rpm on hxr.rpm_uri = rpm.rpm_uri INNER JOIN postponedpayment ppm ON ppm.ppm_uri = rpm.ppm_uri AND (ppm.ppt_uri <> :CAUri ) GROUP BY hxr.har_uri ) b ON b.har_uri = har.har_uri
TReportSQL.where: WHERE har.har_paid IS NOT NULL AND (crp.crp_uri = :crp_uri or :crp_uri = 0)

TReportSQL.select: SELECT IFNULL(org.org_name, 'no organisation') AS 'Organisation name', IFNULL(ort.ort_name, 'no organisation') AS 'Organisation type', monthhar.crop 'Produce', monthhar.groupname 'Group name', monthhar.month 'Month', monthhar.harvests 'Harvests', monthhar.farmers 'Farmers', monthhar.maxkg 'Max delivery', monthhar.avgkg 'Avg delivery', monthhar.kgdelivered 'Total delivery', monthhar.kgafterreject 'Delivery accepted'
TReportSQL.from: FROM (SELECT crp.crp_uri, crp.crp_name as crop, grp.grp_uri, grp.grp_officialname as groupname, MIN(gpc.gpc_date) as harvestdate, DATE_FORMAT(gpc.gpc_date,'%Y-%m') AS month, count(*) as harvests, count(DISTINCT har.cnt_uri) as farmers, max(har.har_amountdelivered) as maxkg, round(avg(har.har_amountdelivered),1) as avgkg, sum(har.har_amountdelivered) as kgdelivered, sum(har.har_amountpaid) as kgafterreject FROM harvest har INNER JOIN crop crp ON crp.crp_uri = har.crp_uri INNER JOIN groupcollection gpc ON gpc.gpc_uri = har.gpc_uri INNER JOIN `groups` grp ON grp.grp_uri = gpc.grp_uri WHERE (( :org_uri = 0) OR (grp.grp_uri IN (SELECT DISTINCT ogm.grp_uri FROM orggroupmembership ogm WHERE (ogm.org_uri = :org_uri AND ogm.ogm_end IS NULL) ))) group by crp.crp_uri, crp.crp_name, grp.grp_uri, grp.grp_officialname, DATE_FORMAT(gpc.gpc_date,'%Y-%m')) monthhar LEFT JOIN orggroupmembership ogm ON monthhar.grp_uri = ogm.grp_uri AND monthhar.harvestdate >=ogm.ogm_start AND (monthhar.harvestdate <= ogm.ogm_end OR ogm.ogm_end IS NULL) LEFT JOIN organisation org ON org.org_uri = ogm.org_uri LEFT JOIN organisationtype ort ON org.ort_uri = ort.ort_uri
TReportSQL.where: WHERE (monthhar.grp_uri = :grp_uri or :grp_uri = 0) AND (monthhar.crp_uri = :crp_uri or :crp_uri = 0)

TReportSQL.select: SELECT IFNULL(cnt.cnt_shortname, 'no facilitator') as facilitator, monthhar.crop, monthhar.groupname, monthhar.month, monthhar.harvests, monthhar.farmers, monthhar.maxkg, monthhar.avgkg, monthhar.kgdelivered, monthhar.kgafterreject
TReportSQL.from: FROM (select crp.crp_name as Crop, grp.grp_uri, grp.grp_officialname as groupname, MIN(gpc.gpc_date) as harvestdate, DATE_FORMAT(gpc.gpc_date,'%Y-%m') as month, count(*) as harvests, count(DISTINCT har.cnt_uri) as farmers, max(har.har_amountdelivered) as maxkg, round(avg(har.har_amountdelivered),1) as avgkg, sum(har.har_amountdelivered) as kgdelivered, sum(har.har_amountpaid) as kgafterreject from harvest har INNER JOIN crop crp ON crp.crp_uri = har.crp_uri INNER JOIN groupcollection gpc ON gpc.gpc_uri = har.gpc_uri INNER JOIN `groups` grp ON grp.grp_uri = gpc.grp_uri group by crp.crp_name, grp.grp_uri, grp.grp_officialname, DATE_FORMAT(gpc.gpc_date,'%Y-%m') ) monthhar LEFT JOIN membership mem ON monthhar.grp_uri = mem.grp_uri AND mem.mst_uri = 13 AND monthhar.harvestdate >= IFNULL(mem.mem_start, DATE_FORMAT('12/31/2004','%m/%d/%Y')) and monthhar.harvestdate <= IFNULL(mem.mem_end, DATE_FORMAT('12/31/2099','%m/%d/%Y')) LEFT JOIN contact cnt ON cnt.cnt_uri = mem.cnt_uri
TReportSQL.where: WHERE (1=1)

TReportSQL.select: SELECT crp.crp_name AS Produce, grp.grp_officialname AS 'Group name', (SELECT CAST(GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT psn.psn_longname) AS CHAR) FROM staffgrouprole sgr INNER JOIN personnel psn ON psn.psn_uri = sgr.psn_uri WHERE sgr.grp_uri=grp.grp_uri AND sgr.rtt_uri=1 ) AS 'Extension officer', DATE_FORMAT(gpc.gpc_date,'%Y-%m') AS Month, COUNT(*) AS'Total collections', COUNT(DISTINCT har.cnt_uri) AS 'Total farmers', MAX(har.har_amountdelivered) AS 'Max delivery', ROUND(AVG(har.har_amountdelivered),1) AS 'Avg delivery', SUM(har.har_amountdelivered) AS 'Total delivery', SUM(har.har_amountpaid) AS 'Delivery paid'
TReportSQL.from: FROM harvest har INNER JOIN crop crp ON crp.crp_uri = har.crp_uri INNER JOIN groupcollection gpc ON gpc.gpc_uri = har.gpc_uri INNER JOIN `groups` grp ON grp.grp_uri = gpc.grp_uri
TReportSQL.where: WHERE (crp.crp_uri = :crp_uri or :crp_uri = 0) AND ( :org_uri = 0 OR (grp.grp_uri IN ( SELECT ogm.grp_uri FROM orggroupmembership ogm WHERE ( ogm.org_uri = :org_uri ) AND ( ogm.ogm_end is NULL ) )))
TReportSQL.orderby: ORDER BY crp.crp_name, grp.grp_officialname , DATE_FORMAT(gpc.gpc_date,'%Y-%m') DESC

TReportSQL.select: SELECT crp.crp_name AS Produce, grp.grp_code AS "Group code", grp.grp_name AS "Group name", cnt.cnt_epid AS "EPID", cnt.cnt_longname AS "Farmer name", cnt.cnt_idnr AS "National ID", cnt.cnt_organiccertno AS "Organic ID", sum(har.har_amountdelivered) AS "Total delivery"
TReportSQL.from: FROM harvest har INNER JOIN contact cnt ON har.cnt_uri = cnt.cnt_uri INNER JOIN crop crp ON har.crp_uri = crp.crp_uri INNER JOIN groupcollection gpc ON har.gpc_uri = gpc.gpc_uri INNER JOIN `groups` grp ON gpc.grp_uri = grp.grp_uri
TReportSQL.where: WHERE har.har_date >= :startdate AND har.har_date <= :enddate AND (grp.grp_uri = :grp_uri or :grp_uri = 0) AND (cnt.cnt_uri = :cnt_uri or :cnt_uri = 0) AND (crp.crp_uri = :crp_uri or :crp_uri = 0) AND ( :org_uri = 0 OR (grp.grp_uri IN ( SELECT ogm.grp_uri FROM orggroupmembership ogm WHERE ( ogm.org_uri = :org_uri ) AND ( ogm.ogm_end is NULL ) )))
TReportSQL.groupby: GROUP BY crp.crp_name, cnt.cnt_epid, cnt.cnt_idnr, cnt.cnt_organiccertno, grp.grp_code, grp.grp_name, cnt.cnt_longname

TReportSQL.select: SELECT DISTINCT date_format(NOW(), '%d/%m/%Y') AS "DATE", grp_officialname AS "GROUP NAME", cnt.cnt_epid AS "EPID", cnt.cnt_shortname AS "FARMER NAME", cnt.CNT_BNK_NAME AS "BANK NAME", cnt.CNT_BNK_BRANCH AS "BRANCH NAME", cnt.CNT_BNK_ACCNAME AS "ACCOUNT NAME", cnt.CNT_BNK_ACCNUMBER AS "ACCOUNT NUMBER", SUM(ccp.ccp_amountnett) AS "AMOUNT", CONCAT(clp.clp_reference , ' ' , cnt.cnt_epid) AS "REF"
TReportSQL.from: FROM contactcollectionpayment ccp INNER JOIN contact cnt ON cnt.cnt_uri = ccp.cnt_uri INNER JOIN collectionpayment clp ON clp.clp_uri = ccp.clp_uri INNER JOIN ( SELECT clp_uri, grp_officialname FROM groupcollectionpayment gcp INNER JOIN bankaccount bnk ON gcp.bnk_uri = bnk.bnk_uri AND bnk.bnk_uri=(select SYS_VALUE FROM SYSPARAMS WHERE SYS_URI=20) INNER JOIN groupcollection gpc ON gcp.GPC_URI = gpc.GPC_URI INNER JOIN `groups` grp ON grp.grp_uri = gpc.GRP_URI GROUP BY clp_uri, grp_officialname )b ON b.clp_uri = clp.clp_uri
TReportSQL.where: WHERE IFNULL(clp.clp_transferred, 0) = 0 AND ccp.ccp_paydate IS NULL

TReportSQL.select: SELECT crp.crp_name AS 'Produce', gpc.gpc_date as 'Collection date', count(*) as 'Total collections', count(DISTINCT har.cnt_uri) as 'Total farmers', max(har.har_amountdelivered) as 'Max delivery', round(avg(har.har_amountdelivered),1) as 'Avg delivery', sum(har.har_amountdelivered) as 'Total delivery'
TReportSQL.from: FROM harvest har INNER JOIN groupcollection gpc ON gpc.gpc_uri = har.gpc_uri INNER JOIN crop crp ON crp.crp_uri = har.crp_uri INNER JOIN `groups` grp ON grp.grp_uri = gpc.grp_uri
TReportSQL.where: WHERE gpc.gpc_date BETWEEN :startdate AND :enddate

TReportSQL.select: SELECT grp.grp_officialname AS "Group name", cnt.cnt_epid AS "EPID", cnt.cnt_longname AS "Farmer name", psn.psn_longname AS "Extension officer", 'Field' AS "Inspection type", tmpl.int_name AS "Template name", ins.ins_date AS "Planned date", ins.ins_date_completion AS "Completion date", fld.fld_fieldno AS "Field number", fld.fld_name AS "Field name", crp.crp_name AS "Produce" FROM inspection ins INNER JOIN personnel psn ON ins.psn_uri = psn.psn_uri INNER JOIN ins_fld ON ins_fld.ins_uri = ins.ins_uri INNER JOIN field fld ON fld.fld_uri = ins_fld.fld_uri INNER JOIN crop crp ON crp.crp_uri = fld.crp_uri INNER JOIN contact cnt ON fld.cnt_uri = cnt.cnt_uri INNER JOIN membership mem ON cnt.cnt_uri = mem.cnt_uri INNER JOIN `groups` grp ON mem.grp_uri = grp.grp_uri INNER JOIN inspectiontemplate tmpl ON tmpl.int_uri=ins.int_uri WHERE ins.ins_status = 'P' AND mem.mst_uri = 1 AND mem.mem_start <= NOW() AND ins.ins_date_completion BETWEEN :startdate AND :enddate AND ((crp.crp_uri= :crp_uri ) OR ( :crp_uri =0)) AND ((grp.grp_uri= :grp_uri ) OR ( :grp_uri =0)) AND ((psn.psn_uri= :psn_uri ) OR ( :psn_uri =0)) AND (mem.mem_end IS NULL OR mem.mem_end > NOW()) UNION ALL SELECT grp.grp_officialname AS "Group", cnt.cnt_epid AS "EPID", cnt.cnt_longname AS "Farmer", psn.psn_longname AS "Inspector", 'Farmer/Contact' AS "Inspection type", tmpl.int_name AS Template, ins.ins_date AS "Date planned", ins.ins_date_completion AS "Completion date", "" AS "Field number", "" AS "Field name", "" AS "Produce" FROM inspection ins INNER JOIN personnel psn ON ins.psn_uri = psn.psn_uri INNER JOIN ins_cnt ON ins_cnt.ins_uri = ins.ins_uri INNER JOIN contact cnt ON ins_cnt.cnt_uri = cnt.cnt_uri LEFT JOIN membership mem ON cnt.cnt_uri = mem.cnt_uri AND mem.mst_uri = 1 AND mem.mem_end IS NULL LEFT JOIN `groups` grp ON mem.grp_uri = grp.grp_uri AND mem.mem_end IS NULL INNER JOIN inspectiontemplate tmpl ON tmpl.int_uri=ins.int_uri WHERE ins.ins_status = 'P' AND ins.ins_date_completion BETWEEN :startdate AND :enddate AND ((grp.grp_uri= :grp_uri ) OR ( :grp_uri =0)) AND ((psn.psn_uri= :psn_uri ) OR ( :psn_uri =0)) UNION ALL SELECT grp.grp_officialname AS "Group", '' AS "EPID", '' AS "Farmer", psn.psn_longname AS "Inspector", 'Group' AS "Inspection type", tmpl.int_name AS Template, ins.ins_date AS "Date planned", ins.ins_date_completion AS "Completion date", "" AS "Field number", "" AS "Field name", '' AS "Produce" FROM inspection ins INNER JOIN personnel psn ON ins.psn_uri = psn.psn_uri INNER JOIN ins_grp ON ins_grp.ins_uri = ins.ins_uri INNER JOIN `groups` grp ON ins_grp.grp_uri = grp.grp_uri INNER JOIN inspectiontemplate tmpl ON tmpl.int_uri=ins.int_uri WHERE ins.ins_status = 'P' AND ins.ins_date_completion BETWEEN :startdate AND :enddate AND ((grp.grp_uri= :grp_uri ) OR ( :grp_uri =0)) AND ((psn.psn_uri= :psn_uri ) OR ( :psn_uri =0))

SELECT grp.grp_code AS "Group code", grp.grp_officialname AS "Group name", crp.crp_name AS "Produce", CASE ins.ins_status WHEN 'E' then 'Executed' WHEN 'P' then 'Planned' when 'C' then 'Cancelled' ELSE 'None' END as "Status", ins.ins_date AS "Last date", ins.counter AS "Total"
TReportSQL.from: FROM `groups` grp LEFT JOIN (SELECT grp.grp_uri, fld.crp_uri, ins.ins_status, max(ins.ins_date) as ins_date, count(ins.ins_date) as counter FROM inspection ins INNER JOIN ins_fld ON ins_fld.ins_uri = ins.ins_uri INNER JOIN field fld ON fld.fld_uri = ins_fld.fld_uri INNER JOIN contact cnt ON fld.cnt_uri = cnt.cnt_uri INNER JOIN membership mem ON cnt.cnt_uri = mem.cnt_uri INNER JOIN `groups` grp ON mem.grp_uri = grp.grp_uri WHERE mem.mst_uri = 1 AND mem.mem_start <= NOW() AND (mem.mem_end IS NULL OR mem.mem_end > NOW()) GROUP BY grp.grp_uri, fld.crp_uri, ins.ins_status) ins ON grp.grp_uri = ins.grp_uri LEFT JOIN crop crp ON crp.crp_uri = ins.crp_uri
TReportSQL.where: WHERE grp_active = 1 AND ( :org_uri = 0 OR (grp.grp_uri IN ( SELECT ogm.grp_uri FROM orggroupmembership ogm WHERE ( ogm.org_uri = :org_uri ) AND ( ogm.ogm_end is NULL ) )))

TReportSQL.select: SELECT COUNT(cnt_idnr) AS 'Count', cnt_idnr AS 'National ID', CAST(GROUP_CONCAT(cnt_epid) AS CHAR) AS 'EPIDs', CAST(GROUP_CONCAT(cnt_shortname) AS CHAR) AS 'Farmer names'
TReportSQL.from: FROM contact
TReportSQL.where: WHERE cnt_idnr <> ''

TReportSQL.select: SELECT grp_code AS "Group code", grp_name as "Group name", cnt_epid as 'EPID' , cnt_shortname as 'Farmer name', crp.CRP_NAME as Produce, fld.fld_fieldno AS "Field number", fld.fld_name AS 'Field name', fit.fit_name AS "Seed origin", fld.fld_traceability AS 'Traceability code', (SELECT fst.fst_name FROM fieldstatus fst INNER JOIN fst_fld ON fst.FST_URI=fst_fld.FST_URI WHERE fst_fld.FSD_ACTIVE=1 AND fst_fld.FLD_URI=fld.fld_uri LIMIT 1) as 'Field status', fld.fld_start AS 'Start date', ifnull(fld.fld_end, fld.FLD_ESTEND) AS 'End date', fld.fld_size * crp.CRP_UNITSIZE as 'Field size', unt.UNT_NAME as 'Unit', fld.fld_seeds_planted AS "Seeds Planted", concat(convert(fld.FLD_PRODUCTIVITY, signed INTEGER), '%') AS Productivity, (SELECT CAST(GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT psn.psn_longname) AS CHAR) FROM staffgrouprole sgr INNER JOIN personnel psn ON psn.psn_uri = sgr.psn_uri WHERE sgr.grp_uri=grp.grp_uri AND sgr.rtt_uri=1) AS 'Extension officer', EXTRACTVALUE( fld.fld_gpslocation,'/TCSLocation') AS "GPS coordinates", fld.fld_gpslocation AS "gpslocation_data"
TReportSQL.from: FROM `groups` grp INNER JOIN membership mem ON mem.grp_uri=grp.grp_uri AND mem.mst_uri=1 and mem.mem_end IS NULL INNER JOIN contact cnt ON cnt.cnt_uri=mem.cnt_uri AND cnt.cnt_active=1 INNER JOIN field fld ON fld.cnt_uri=cnt.cnt_uri AND (fld.fld_end IS NULL OR fld.fld_end < NOW()) INNER JOIN crop crp ON crp.crp_uri=fld.crp_uri INNER JOIN unit unt ON unt.UNT_URI=crp.unt_uri LEFT JOIN fieldinitiationtype fit ON fit.FIT_URI=fld.fld_seed_origin
TReportSQL.where: WHERE grp.GRP_ACTIVE=1 AND fld.fld_start BETWEEN :startdate AND :enddate AND ( :org_uri = 0 OR (grp.grp_uri IN ( SELECT ogm.grp_uri FROM orggroupmembership ogm WHERE ( ogm.org_uri = :org_uri ) AND ( ogm.ogm_end is NULL ) )))
TReportSQL.groupby: GROUP BY grp_code, cnt_epid, crp.CRP_NAME, fld.fld_fieldno,fit.fit_name, fld.fld_traceability, fld.fld_uri

TReportSQL.select: SELECT grp_code AS 'Group code', grp_name as 'Group name', cnt_epid as 'EPID', cnt_shortname as 'Farmer name', cti.cti_start 'Contract start', cti.CTI_END 'Contract end', prd.CRP_NAME as Produce, unt.UNT_NAME as Unit
TReportSQL.from: FROM `groups` grp INNER JOIN membership mem ON mem.grp_uri=grp.grp_uri AND mem.mst_uri=1 and mem.mem_end IS NULL INNER JOIN contact cnt ON cnt.cnt_uri=mem.cnt_uri AND cnt.cnt_active=1 INNER JOIN contract ctr ON ctr.cnt_uri=cnt.cnt_uri INNER JOIN contractitem cti on cti.CTR_uri = ctr.ctr_uri AND (cti.cti_end IS NULL OR cti.cti_end > NOW()) and cti.cti_start < NOW() INNER JOIN cropcontract cct on cct.CTR_URI=cti.ctr_uri AND cct.CTI_URI=cti.CTI_URI INNER JOIN crop prd ON prd.crp_uri=cct.crp_uri INNER JOIN unit unt ON unt.UNT_URI=prd.unt_uri
TReportSQL.where: WHERE grp.GRP_ACTIVE=1 AND ( :org_uri = 0 OR (grp.grp_uri IN ( SELECT ogm.grp_uri FROM orggroupmembership ogm WHERE ( ogm.org_uri = :org_uri ) AND ( ogm.ogm_end is NULL ) )))

TReportSQL.select: SELECT DATE_FORMAT(har.har_date,'%Y-%m') as Period, grp_name as 'Group name', grp_code AS 'Group code', cnt_epid as 'EPID', cnt_shortname as 'Farmer name', cnt.cnt_idnr AS 'National ID', cnt.cnt_organiccertno AS "Organic ID", CASE WHEN (HAR_TRACECODE LIKE '<t>%') THEN CONCAT_WS(" ", EXTRACTVALUE(HAR_TRACECODE, '//t//n'), EXTRACTVALUE(HAR_TRACECODE, '//t//d')) ELSE har.HAR_TRACECODE END AS 'TRACECODE1', CASE WHEN (HAR_TRACECODE2 LIKE '<t>%') THEN CONCAT_WS(" ", EXTRACTVALUE(HAR_TRACECODE2, '//t//n'), EXTRACTVALUE(HAR_TRACECODE2, '//t//d')) ELSE har.HAR_TRACECODE2 END AS 'TRACECODE2', prd.CRP_NAME as Produce, unt.UNT_NAME as 'Unit', date(har.har_date) as 'Collection date', har.HAR_AMOUNTDELIVERED as 'Total delivery', CONCAT(ROUND(har.HAR_PERCPAID, 0), ' %') as 'Percent paid', har.HAR_AMOUNTPAID as 'Amount paid', cnt.cnt_hasorganiccert as 'Organic certified'
TReportSQL.from: FROM `groups` grp INNER JOIN membership mem ON mem.grp_uri=grp.grp_uri AND mem.mst_uri=1 and mem.mem_end IS NULL INNER JOIN contact cnt ON cnt.cnt_uri=mem.cnt_uri AND cnt.cnt_active=1 INNER JOIN harvest har ON har.cnt_uri=cnt.cnt_uri INNER JOIN crop prd ON prd.crp_uri=har.crp_uri INNER JOIN unit unt ON unt.unt_uri=prd.UNT_PAYMENT_URI
TReportSQL.where: WHERE grp.GRP_ACTIVE=1 AND ( har.har_date BETWEEN :startdate AND :enddate ) AND ( :org_uri = 0 OR (grp.grp_uri IN ( SELECT ogm.grp_uri FROM orggroupmembership ogm WHERE ( ogm.org_uri = :org_uri ) AND ( ogm.ogm_end is NULL ) )))

TReportSQL.select: SELECT CAST(GROUP_CONCAT(grp.grp_code ) AS CHAR) AS 'Group code', CAST(GROUP_CONCAT(grp.grp_officialname) AS CHAR) AS 'Group name', cnt.cnt_epid AS 'EPID', cnt.cnt_longname AS 'Farmer name', cnt.cnt_idnr AS 'National ID', cnt.cnt_active as Active, cnt.cnt_gender as Gender, cnt.cnt_dob as 'Date of birth', TRUNCATE(DATEDIFF(NOW(),cnt.CNT_DOB)/365,0) AS 'Age', cnt.cnt_phone as 'Phone number', cnt.cnt_email as 'E-mail', cnt.cnt_hasorganiccert as 'Organic certified', cnt.cnt_province AS ADMINLEVEL1, cnt.cnt_district AS ADMINLEVEL2, cnt.cnt_division AS ADMINLEVEL3, cnt.cnt_location AS ADMINLEVEL4, cnt.cnt_isvalidated as Validated, CAST( GROUP_CONCAT( date( mbs.mem_start)) AS CHAR) AS Started, (SELECT CAST(GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT psn.psn_longname) AS CHAR) FROM staffgrouprole sgr INNER JOIN personnel psn ON psn.psn_uri = sgr.psn_uri WHERE sgr.grp_uri=grp.grp_uri AND sgr.rtt_uri=1) AS 'Extension officer'
TReportSQL.from: FROM contact cnt LEFT JOIN membership mbs ON mbs.cnt_uri = cnt.cnt_uri AND mbs.mst_uri = 1 AND mbs.mem_end IS NULL LEFT JOIN `groups` grp ON mbs.grp_uri = grp.grp_uri AND mbs.mem_end IS NULL LEFT JOIN orggroupmembership ogm ON ogm.grp_uri = grp.grp_uri AND ogm.ogm_end IS NULL LEFT JOIN hierarchymembership him ON him.org_uri = ogm.org_uri AND him.him_end IS NULL
TReportSQL.where: WHERE (1=1) AND (him.hie_uri = :hie_uri OR :hie_uri = 0) AND (ogm.org_uri = :org_uri OR :org_uri = 0 ) AND ( grp.grp_uri = :grp_uri OR :grp_uri = 0 ) AND ( :org_uri = 0 OR (grp.grp_uri IN ( SELECT ogm.grp_uri FROM orggroupmembership ogm WHERE ( ogm.org_uri = :org_uri ) AND ( ogm.ogm_end is NULL ) )))

TReportSQL.select: SELECT DATE_FORMAT(now() ,'%Y%m%d%H%i%s') AS TransHeaderNozyx, -- Unique Order Transaction Number - HAS TO BE THE SAME FOR ALL LINES 'MOBILE1234' AS ExtOrderNumzyx, -- Your Mobile Unique Transaction Reference - HAS TO BE THE SAME FOR ALL LINES DATE_FORMAT(har.har_date,'%m/%d/%Y') AS InvDatezyx, -- Use mm/dd/yyyyy format, DATE_FORMAT(har.har_date,'%M/%D/%Y') IFNULL(grp.GRP_SAGE_PURCHASELEDGER, grp.GRP_CODE) AS ClientAccountzyx, -- Sage Supplier Code from table = dbo.Vendor , field = Account grp.grp_location AS Areazy, -- Sage Areas from table = dbo.Areas, field = code cnt.CNT_PHONE AS Telephonezyx, -- Mobile No cnt.cnt_email AS Emailzyx, -- Optional Email 'MOBILEPURCHASES' AS Descriptionzyx, -- Have a default Text to help in Identifitying Mobile purchases gpc.GPC_NUMBER AS OrderNumzyx, -- Order reference har.HAR_TRACECODE AS DeliveryNotezyx, -- Optional References 'MOBILEPURCHASES' AS ProjectNamezyx, -- Sage projects for report purchases 'Admin' AS cAgentNamezyx, -- Sage Agent id from dbo._rtblAgents field cAgentName crp.CRP_CODE AS ItemCodezyx, -- Sage stock code from table = dbo.StkItem, field = cSimpleCode crp.CRP_NAME AS ItemNamezyx, -- Sage stock name from table = dbo.StkItem, field = Description_1 crp.CRP_DESC AS cDescriptionzyx, -- Stock Description with more details 'Mstr' AS WHSEzyx, -- Sage Warehouse from table = dbo.WhseMst, field = Code har.HAR_AMOUNTPAID AS fQuantityzyx, FORMAT(har.har_price, sp54.decim) AS fUnitPriceExclzyx, (SELECT count(h2.har_uri) FROM harvest h2 where h2.gpc_uri=gpc.gpc_uri) AS lngnooflines, -- IMPORTANT - Count the NUMBER of lines in the details of your order '0,0' AS Latixzyx, -- Optional Latitude from your GPS service '0,0' AS Longixzyx
TReportSQL.from: FROM harvest har INNER JOIN groupcollection gpc ON gpc.gpc_uri=har.gpc_uri INNER JOIN `groups` grp ON gpc.grp_uri = grp.grp_uri INNER JOIN contact cnt ON cnt.cnt_uri = har.cnt_uri INNER JOIN crop crp ON crp.CRP_URI=har.crp_uri INNER JOIN (SELECT CAST(sp.sys_value AS UNSIGNED) as decim FROM sysparams sp WHERE sp.sys_uri = 54) sp54
TReportSQL.where: WHERE gpc.gpc_status = 'PP' AND har.har_date >=:startdate AND har.har_date < :enddate

TReportSQL.select: SELECT intt.int_uri, intt.int_name AS 'Template name', ins.ins_uri, ins.ins_date AS 'Planned date', ins.ins_date_completion AS 'Completion date', psn.psn_longname AS 'Extension officer', fld.fld_uri, fld.fld_fieldno AS 'Field number', fld.fld_name AS 'Field name', prd.crp_uri, prd.crp_name as Produce, EXTRACTVALUE(fld.fld_gpslocation, '/TCSLocation') AS "Field GPS cordinates", unt.UNT_NAME as 'Unit', EXTRACTVALUE(ins.ins_gpslocation, '/TCSLocation') AS "Survey GPS coordinates", grp.grp_uri, grp.grp_officialname AS 'Group name', EXTRACTVALUE(grp.grp_gpslocation, '/TCSLocation') AS "Group GPS cordinates", cnt.cnt_uri, cnt.cnt_epid AS 'EPID', cnt.cnt_longname AS 'Farmer name', EXTRACTVALUE(cnt.cnt_gpslocation, '/TCSLocation') AS "Farmer GPS cordinates", itq.itq_uri, itq.itq_desc AS question, ina.ina_uri, CONCAT(COALESCE(ina.ina_shorttext, ''), COALESCE(ina.ina_longtext, ''), COALESCE(ina.ina_amount, ''), COALESCE(DATE(ina.ina_date), '')) AS answer
TReportSQL.from: FROM inspection ins INNER JOIN inspectiontemplate intt ON intt.int_uri = ins.int_uri INNER JOIN ins_fld ON ins_fld.ins_uri=ins.ins_uri INNER JOIN field fld ON fld.fld_uri = ins_fld.fld_uri INNER JOIN crop prd ON prd.crp_uri = fld.crp_uri INNER JOIN unit unt ON unt.unt_uri = prd.unt_uri INNER JOIN contact cnt ON cnt.cnt_uri = fld.cnt_uri INNER JOIN membership mbs ON mbs.cnt_uri = cnt.cnt_uri INNER JOIN `groups` grp ON mbs.grp_uri = grp.grp_uri INNER JOIN templategroup tpg ON tpg.int_uri = intt.int_uri INNER JOIN inspectiontemplatequestion itq ON itq.tpg_uri = tpg.tpg_uri INNER JOIN questiontype qty ON qty.qty_uri = itq.qty_uri INNER JOIN personnel psn ON psn.psn_uri = ins.PSN_URI LEFT OUTER JOIN inspectionanswer ina ON ina.itq_uri = itq.itq_uri AND ina.ins_uri = ins.ins_uri
TReportSQL.where: WHERE ins.ins_status='E' AND qty.qty_code <> 'NONE' AND mbs.mst_uri=1 AND (grp.grp_uri = :grp_uri OR :grp_uri =0) AND COALESCE(mbs.mem_end, ins.ins_date) >= ins.ins_date AND COALESCE(mbs.mem_start, ins.ins_date) <= ins.ins_date AND ins.ins_date_completion BETWEEN :startdate AND :enddate AND (( :org_uri = 0) OR (grp.grp_uri IN (SELECT DISTINCT ogm.grp_uri FROM orggroupmembership ogm WHERE (ogm.org_uri = :org_uri AND ogm.ogm_end IS NULL) )))
TReportSQL.orderby: ORDER BY ins.ins_date, grp.grp_officialname, cnt.cnt_longname, prd.crp_name, ins.ins_uri, tpg.tpg_order, itq.itq_order, ina.ina_uri

TReportSQL.select: SELECT ppt.ppt_desc as "Loan type", `Group code`,`Group name`, cnt_detail.cnt_epid as 'EPID', cnt_detail.CNT_SHORTNAME as "Farmer name", count(distinct ppm.ppm_number) as "Loans", min(ppm.ppm_date) as "First opened", max(ppm.ppm_date) as "Last opened", IFNULL(DATE_FORMAT(max(ppm.ppm_lastrepayment), '%d/%m/%Y'), 'never') as "Last repayed", sum(ppm.ppm_amount) as "Total amount", sum(ppm.ppm_amount) - sum(ppm.ppm_balance) as "Repayed amount", sum(ppm.ppm_balance) as "Amount open"
TReportSQL.from: FROM postponedpayment ppm INNER JOIN postponedpaymenttype ppt ON ppm.ppt_uri = ppt.ppt_uri INNER JOIN ( SELECT DISTINCT CAST(GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT grp.grp_code) AS CHAR ) AS `Group code`, CAST(GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT grp.grp_name) AS CHAR) AS `Group name`, cnt.cnt_uri, cnt_epid, cnt_shortname FROM contact cnt LEFT JOIN membership mem ON cnt.cnt_uri = mem.cnt_uri AND mem.mst_uri = 1 LEFT JOIN `groups` grp ON grp.grp_uri = mem.grp_uri AND mem.mem_end is NULL WHERE ( grp.grp_uri = :grp_uri OR :grp_uri = 0 ) AND ( cnt.cnt_uri = :cnt_uri OR :cnt_uri = 0 ) AND ( :org_uri = 0 OR (grp.grp_uri IN ( SELECT ogm.grp_uri FROM orggroupmembership ogm WHERE ( ogm.org_uri = :org_uri ) AND ( ogm.ogm_end is NULL ) ))) GROUP BY CNT.CNT_URI) cnt_detail ON cnt_detail.cnt_uri=ppm.cnt_uri
TReportSQL.where: WHERE (ppt.ppt_uri <> :CAUri )

TReportSQL.select: SELECT BASE2.produce Produce, base2.GroupCode 'Group code', base2.Group 'Group name', base2.epid 'EPID', base2.Farmer 'Farmer name', base2.idnumber 'National ID', base2.gender 'Gender', -- to avoid duplicates if farmer is member of more then one group (SELECT DATE_FORMAT(min(mem.mem_start), '%Y') FROM membership mem WHERE mem.grp_uri=base2.grp_uri AND mem.cnt_uri=base2.cnt_uri) as 'Start year', base2.har3 as 'Deliveries year 3', base2.har2 as "Deliveries year 2", base2.har1 as "Deliveries year 1", base2.total as 'Total amount', -- avg if you only produce one year then avg is of that one year! base2.total/(IF(ISNULL(base2.har3),0,1)+IF(ISNULL(base2.har2),0,1)+IF(ISNULL(base2.har1),0,1)) AS "3-year average"
TReportSQL.from:
FROM ( SELECT BASE.*, (SELECT sum(har1.har_amountdelivered) FROM harvest har1 WHERE har1.crp_uri = base.crp_uri AND har1.cnt_uri = base.cnt_uri AND har1.har_date >= DATE_FORMAT(BASE.Y3, '%Y-01-01') AND har1.har_date < DATE_FORMAT(BASE.Y2, '%Y-01-01')) as har3, (SELECT sum(har2.har_amountdelivered) FROM harvest har2 WHERE har2.crp_uri = base.crp_uri AND har2.cnt_uri = base.cnt_uri AND har2.har_date >= DATE_FORMAT(BASE.Y2, '%Y-01-01') AND har2.har_date < DATE_FORMAT(BASE.Y1, '%Y-01-01')) as har2, (SELECT sum(har3.har_amountdelivered) FROM harvest har3 WHERE har3.crp_uri = base.crp_uri AND har3.cnt_uri = base.cnt_uri AND har3.har_date >= DATE_FORMAT(BASE.Y1, '%Y-01-01') AND har3.har_date < DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y-01-01')) as har1 FROM (SELECT crp.crp_name AS Produce, crp.crp_uri, cnt.cnt_epid AS EPID, cnt.cnt_uri, cnt.cnt_idnr AS IDNumber, cnt.cnt_gender as gender, grp.grp_uri, grp.grp_code AS "GroupCode", grp.grp_name AS "Group", cnt.cnt_longname AS Farmer, -- DATE_FORMAT(mem.mem_start, '%Y') AS YearStart, DATE_FORMAT(DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 3 YEAR), '%Y-01-01') AS Y3, DATE_FORMAT(DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 2 YEAR), '%Y-01-01') AS Y2, DATE_FORMAT(DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 1 YEAR), '%Y-01-01') AS Y1, sum(har.har_amountdelivered) AS Total FROM harvest har INNER JOIN contact cnt ON har.cnt_uri = cnt.cnt_uri INNER JOIN crop crp ON har.crp_uri = crp.crp_uri INNER JOIN groupcollection gpc ON har.gpc_uri = gpc.gpc_uri INNER JOIN `groups` grp ON gpc.grp_uri = grp.grp_uri -- EFR todo this will give duplicate if one farmer is a farmer in more then one group actively -- INNER JOIN membership mem ON mem.grp_uri=grp.grp_uri AND mem.cnt_uri=cnt.cnt_uri AND mem.mem_end IS NULL
WHERE (har.crp_uri = :crp_uri OR :crp_uri =0) AND (grp.grp_uri = :grp_uri OR :grp_uri =0) AND har.har_date >= DATE_FORMAT(DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 3 YEAR), '%Y-01-01') AND har.har_date < DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y-01-01')
GROUP BY crp.crp_name, crp.crp_uri, cnt.cnt_epid, grp.grp_code, grp.grp_name, cnt.cnt_longname ORDER BY crp.crp_name, grp.grp_code, cnt_longname DESC ) BASE
GROUP BY base.crp_uri, base.grp_uri, base.cnt_uri ) base2
TReportSQL.where: WHERE (1=1) AND ( :org_uri = 0 OR (base2.grp_uri IN ( SELECT ogm.grp_uri FROM orggroupmembership ogm WHERE ( ogm.org_uri = :org_uri ) AND ( ogm.ogm_end is NULL ) )))

TReportSQL.select: SELECT BASE2.produce Produce, base2.GroupCode 'Group code', base2.Group 'Group name', base2.epid 'EPID', base2.Farmer 'Farmer name', base2.idnumber 'National ID', base2.gender 'Gender', loans.Loans , loans.Firstopened 'First opened', loans.lastopened 'Last opened', loans.Lastrepayed 'last repayment', loans.Totalamount 'Total amount', loans.Repayedamount 'Repaid amount', loans.Amountopen 'Amount open', -- to avoid duplicates if farmer is member of more then one group (SELECT DATE_FORMAT(min(mem.mem_start), '%Y') FROM membership mem WHERE mem.grp_uri=base2.grp_uri AND mem.cnt_uri=base2.cnt_uri) as 'Start year', base2.har3 as "Deliveries year 3", base2.har2 as "Deliveries year 2", base2.har1 as "Deliveries year 1", base2.total as "Total amount", -- avg if you only produce one year then avg is of that one year! Total/(IF(ISNULL(base2.har3),0,1)+IF(ISNULL(base2.har2),0,1)+IF(ISNULL(base2.har1),0,1)) AS "3-year average"
TReportSQL.from:
FROM ( SELECT BASE.*, (SELECT sum(har1.har_amountdelivered) FROM harvest har1 WHERE har1.crp_uri = base.crp_uri AND har1.cnt_uri = base.cnt_uri AND har1.har_date >= DATE_FORMAT(BASE.Y3, '%Y-01-01') AND har1.har_date < DATE_FORMAT(BASE.Y2, '%Y-01-01')) as har3, (SELECT sum(har2.har_amountdelivered) FROM harvest har2 WHERE har2.crp_uri = base.crp_uri AND har2.cnt_uri = base.cnt_uri AND har2.har_date >= DATE_FORMAT(BASE.Y2, '%Y-01-01') AND har2.har_date < DATE_FORMAT(BASE.Y1, '%Y-01-01')) as har2, (SELECT sum(har3.har_amountdelivered) FROM harvest har3 WHERE har3.crp_uri = base.crp_uri AND har3.cnt_uri = base.cnt_uri AND har3.har_date >= DATE_FORMAT(BASE.Y1, '%Y-01-01') AND har3.har_date < DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y-01-01')) as har1 FROM (SELECT crp.crp_name AS Produce, crp.crp_uri, cnt.cnt_epid AS EPID, cnt.cnt_uri, cnt.cnt_idnr AS IDNumber, cnt.cnt_gender as gender, grp.grp_uri, grp.grp_code AS "GroupCode", grp.grp_name AS "Group", cnt.cnt_longname AS Farmer, -- DATE_FORMAT(mem.mem_start, '%Y') AS YearStart, DATE_FORMAT(DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 3 YEAR), '%Y-01-01') AS Y3, DATE_FORMAT(DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 2 YEAR), '%Y-01-01') AS Y2, DATE_FORMAT(DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 1 YEAR), '%Y-01-01') AS Y1, sum(har.har_amountdelivered) AS Total FROM harvest har INNER JOIN contact cnt ON har.cnt_uri = cnt.cnt_uri INNER JOIN crop crp ON har.crp_uri = crp.crp_uri INNER JOIN groupcollection gpc ON har.gpc_uri = gpc.gpc_uri INNER JOIN `groups` grp ON gpc.grp_uri = grp.grp_uri -- EFR todo this will give duplicate if one farmer is a farmer in more then one group actively -- INNER JOIN membership mem ON mem.grp_uri=grp.grp_uri AND mem.cnt_uri=cnt.cnt_uri AND mem.mem_end IS NULL
WHERE (har.crp_uri = :crp_uri OR :crp_uri =0) AND (grp.grp_uri = :grp_uri OR :grp_uri =0) AND har.har_date >= DATE_FORMAT(DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 3 YEAR), '%Y-01-01') AND har.har_date < DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y-01-01')
GROUP BY crp.crp_name, crp.crp_uri, cnt.cnt_epid, grp.grp_code, grp.grp_name, cnt.cnt_longname ) BASE GROUP BY base.crp_uri, base.grp_uri, base.cnt_uri ) base2 LEFT JOIN (SELECT cnt.cnt_uri, count(distinct ppm.ppm_number) as loans, DATE_FORMAT(min(ppm.ppm_date), '%Y-%m') as Firstopened, DATE_FORMAT(max(ppm.ppm_date) , '%Y-%m') as Lastopened, IFNULL(DATE_FORMAT(max(ppm.ppm_lastrepayment), '%Y-%m-%d'), 'never') as Lastrepayed, sum(ppm.ppm_amount) as Totalamount, sum(ppm.ppm_amount) - sum(ppm.ppm_balance) as Repayedamount, sum(ppm.ppm_balance) as Amountopen FROM postponedpayment ppm INNER JOIN postponedpaymenttype ppt ON ppm.ppt_uri = ppt.ppt_uri INNER JOIN membership mem ON mem.cnt_uri = ppm.cnt_uri AND mem.mem_end is null AND mem.mst_uri = 1 INNER JOIN contact cnt ON cnt.cnt_uri=mem.cnt_uri
WHERE (ppt.ppt_uri <> :CAUri ) AND (ppt.ppt_uri = :ppt_uri OR :ppt_uri =0) AND (mem.grp_uri= :grp_uri OR :grp_uri = 0)
GROUP BY cnt.cnt_uri) LOANS ON base2.cnt_uri=loans.cnt_uri
TReportSQL.where: WHERE (1=1) AND ( base2.cnt_uri = :cnt_uri OR :cnt_uri =0 ) AND ( :org_uri = 0 OR (base2.grp_uri IN ( SELECT ogm.grp_uri FROM orggroupmembership ogm WHERE ( ogm.org_uri = :org_uri ) AND ( ogm.ogm_end is NULL ) )))

TReportSQL.select: SELECT fld.crp_uri, crp.crp_name as Produce, grp.grp_officialname 'Group name', cnt.cnt_uri, cnt.cnt_epid 'EPID', cnt.cnt_shortname 'Farmer name', fst.fst_name as Status, date(min(fsd.fsd_start)) as 'Start date', sum(fld.fld_seeds_planted) as 'Seeds planted', sum(tpl.tpl_amount) 'Planted', sum(fld.fld_size) * crp.CRP_UNITSIZE as Size, unt.UNT_NAME as Unit
TReportSQL.from: FROM membership mem INNER JOIN `groups` grp ON mem.grp_uri = grp.grp_uri INNER JOIN contact cnt ON cnt.cnt_uri = mem.cnt_uri INNER JOIN field fld ON fld.cnt_uri = cnt.cnt_uri INNER JOIN crop crp ON crp.CRP_URI = fld.crp_uri INNER JOIN fst_fld fsd ON fld.fld_uri = fsd.fld_uri INNER JOIN unit unt ON unt.unt_uri = crp.UNT_URI LEFT JOIN transplanting tpl ON tpl.fld_uri = fld.fld_uri INNER JOIN fieldstatus fst ON fsd.fst_uri = fst.fst_uri AND fsd.fsd_active = 1
TReportSQL.where: WHERE (grp.grp_uri = :grp_uri OR :grp_uri = 0) AND (crp.crp_uri = :crp_uri OR :crp_uri = 0) AND grp.grp_active = 1 AND mem.mst_uri = 1 AND mem.mem_end IS NULL AND (fld.fld_end IS NULL or fld.fld_end > NOW()) AND ((SELECT min(fsd.fsd_start)) BETWEEN :startdate AND :enddate ) AND ( :org_uri = 0 OR (grp.grp_uri IN ( SELECT ogm.grp_uri FROM orggroupmembership ogm WHERE ( ogm.org_uri = :org_uri ) AND ( ogm.ogm_end is NULL ) )))
TReportSQL.groupby: GROUP BY grp.grp_officialname, fld.crp_uri, cnt.cnt_uri, cnt.cnt_epid, cnt.cnt_shortname, fst.fst_name
TReportSQL.orderby: ORDER BY crp.crp_name,grp.grp_officialname, cnt.cnt_shortname, date(min(fsd.fsd_start)) DESC

TReportSQL.select: SELECT BASE2.Produce, base2.GroupCode 'Group code', base2.Group 'Group name', base2.epid 'EPID', base2.Farmer 'Farmer name', base2.idnumber 'National ID', base2.gender 'Gender', loans.Loans, loans.Firstopened 'First opened', loans.lastopened 'Last opened', loans.Lastrepayed 'Last repayment', loans.Totalamount 'Total amount', loans.Repayedamount 'Repaid amount', loans.Amountopen 'Open amount' , fields.status 'Status', fields.started 'Start date', fields.seeds 'Seeds planted', fields.planted 'Planted', fields.size 'Size', fields.unit 'Unit', -- to avoid duplicates if farmer is member of more then one group (SELECT DATE_FORMAT(min(mem.mem_start), '%Y') FROM membership mem WHERE mem.grp_uri=base2.grp_uri AND mem.cnt_uri=base2.cnt_uri) as 'Start year', base2.har3 as "Deliveries year 3", base2.har2 as "Deliveries year 2", base2.har1 as "Deliveries year 1", base2.total as 'Total delivery', -- avg if you only produce one year then avg is of that one year! Total/(IF(ISNULL(base2.har3),0,1)+IF(ISNULL(base2.har2),0,1)+IF(ISNULL(base2.har1),0,1)) AS "3-year average"
TReportSQL.from:
FROM ( SELECT BASE.*, (SELECT sum(har1.har_amountdelivered) FROM harvest har1 WHERE har1.crp_uri = base.crp_uri AND har1.cnt_uri = base.cnt_uri AND har1.har_date >= DATE_FORMAT(BASE.Y3, '%Y-01-01') AND har1.har_date < DATE_FORMAT(BASE.Y2, '%Y-01-01')) as har3, (SELECT sum(har2.har_amountdelivered) FROM harvest har2 WHERE har2.crp_uri = base.crp_uri AND har2.cnt_uri = base.cnt_uri AND har2.har_date >= DATE_FORMAT(BASE.Y2, '%Y-01-01') AND har2.har_date < DATE_FORMAT(BASE.Y1, '%Y-01-01')) as har2, (SELECT sum(har3.har_amountdelivered) FROM harvest har3 WHERE har3.crp_uri = base.crp_uri AND har3.cnt_uri = base.cnt_uri AND har3.har_date >= DATE_FORMAT(BASE.Y1, '%Y-01-01') AND har3.har_date < DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y-01-01')) as har1 FROM (SELECT crp.crp_name AS Produce, crp.crp_uri, cnt.cnt_epid AS EPID, cnt.cnt_uri, cnt.cnt_idnr AS IDNumber, cnt.cnt_gender as gender, grp.grp_uri, grp.grp_code AS "GroupCode", grp.grp_name AS "Group", cnt.cnt_longname AS Farmer, -- DATE_FORMAT(mem.mem_start, '%Y') AS YearStart, DATE_FORMAT(DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 3 YEAR), '%Y-01-01') AS Y3, DATE_FORMAT(DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 2 YEAR), '%Y-01-01') AS Y2, DATE_FORMAT(DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 1 YEAR), '%Y-01-01') AS Y1, sum(har.har_amountdelivered) AS Total FROM harvest har INNER JOIN contact cnt ON har.cnt_uri = cnt.cnt_uri INNER JOIN crop crp ON har.crp_uri = crp.crp_uri INNER JOIN groupcollection gpc ON har.gpc_uri = gpc.gpc_uri INNER JOIN `groups` grp ON gpc.grp_uri = grp.grp_uri -- EFR todo this will give duplicate if one farmer is a farmer in more then one group actively -- INNER JOIN membership mem ON mem.grp_uri=grp.grp_uri AND mem.cnt_uri=cnt.cnt_uri AND mem.mem_end IS NULL WHERE (har.crp_uri = :crp_uri OR :crp_uri =0) AND (grp.grp_uri = :grp_uri OR :grp_uri =0) AND (cnt.cnt_uri = :cnt_uri OR :cnt_uri =0) AND har.har_date >= DATE_FORMAT(DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 3 YEAR), '%Y-01-01') AND har.har_date < DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y-01-01') GROUP BY crp.crp_name, crp.crp_uri, cnt.cnt_epid, grp.grp_code, grp.grp_name, cnt.cnt_longname ) BASE GROUP BY base.crp_uri, base.grp_uri, base.cnt_uri ) base2 LEFT JOIN (SELECT cnt.cnt_uri, count(distinct ppm.ppm_number) as loans, DATE_FORMAT(min(ppm.ppm_date), '%Y-%m') as Firstopened, DATE_FORMAT(max(ppm.ppm_date) , '%Y-%m') as Lastopened, IFNULL(DATE_FORMAT(max(ppm.ppm_lastrepayment), '%Y-%m-%d'), 'never') as Lastrepayed, sum(ppm.ppm_amount) as Totalamount, sum(ppm.ppm_amount) - sum(ppm.ppm_balance) as Repayedamount, sum(ppm.ppm_balance) as Amountopen FROM postponedpayment ppm INNER JOIN postponedpaymenttype ppt ON ppm.ppt_uri = ppt.ppt_uri INNER JOIN membership mem ON mem.cnt_uri = ppm.cnt_uri AND mem.mem_end is null AND mem.mst_uri = 1 INNER JOIN contact cnt ON cnt.cnt_uri=mem.cnt_uri WHERE (ppt.ppt_uri <> :CAUri ) AND (ppt.ppt_uri = :ppt_uri OR :ppt_uri =0) AND (mem.grp_uri= :grp_uri OR :grp_uri = 0) GROUP BY cnt.cnt_uri) LOANS ON base2.cnt_uri=loans.cnt_uri LEFT JOIN (SELECT fld.crp_uri, cnt.cnt_uri, fst.fst_name as status, min(fsd.fsd_start) as started, sum(fld.fld_seeds_planted) as seeds, sum(tpl.tpl_amount) planted, sum(fld.fld_size) * crp.CRP_UNITSIZE as size, unt.UNT_NAME as unit FROM membership mem INNER JOIN `groups` grp ON mem.grp_uri = grp.grp_uri INNER JOIN contact cnt ON cnt.cnt_uri = mem.cnt_uri INNER JOIN field fld ON fld.cnt_uri = cnt.cnt_uri INNER JOIN crop crp ON crp.CRP_URI = fld.crp_uri INNER JOIN fst_fld fsd ON fld.fld_uri = fsd.fld_uri INNER JOIN unit unt ON unt.unt_uri = crp.UNT_URI LEFT JOIN transplanting tpl ON tpl.fld_uri = fld.fld_uri LEFT JOIN fieldstatus fst ON fsd.fst_uri = fst.fst_uri AND fsd.fsd_active = 1
WHERE (grp.grp_uri = :grp_uri OR :grp_uri = 0) AND (fld.crp_uri = :crp_uri OR :crp_uri = 0) AND grp.grp_active = 1 AND mem.mst_uri = 1 AND mem.mem_end IS NULL AND (fld.fld_end IS NULL or fld.fld_end > NOW())
GROUP BY fld.crp_uri, cnt.cnt_uri, fst.fst_name ) fields ON base2.cnt_uri=fields.cnt_uri AND base2.crp_uri=fields.crp_uri
TReportSQL.where: WHERE (1=1) AND ( :org_uri = 0 OR (base2.grp_uri IN ( SELECT ogm.grp_uri FROM orggroupmembership ogm WHERE ( ogm.org_uri = :org_uri ) AND ( ogm.ogm_end is NULL ) )))

TReportSQL.select: SELECT cnt.CNT_SHORTNAME AS PayeeName, IFNULL (NULLIF(TRIM(TRAILING SUBSTRING_INDEX(REPLACE(REPLACE(cnt.CNT_PHONE,'/', ','),' ', ''), ',', -1) FROM SUBSTRING_INDEX(REPLACE( REPLACE(cnt.CNT_PHONE,',', ''),'/', ''),' ',1) ), ''),cnt.CNT_PHONE) AS PayeeMobileNo, SUM(ccp.ccp_amountnett) AS Amount, CAST( GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT clp.clp_reference) AS CHAR) AS Reference
TReportSQL.from: FROM contactcollectionpayment ccp INNER JOIN contact cnt ON cnt.cnt_uri = ccp.cnt_uri INNER JOIN collectionpayment clp ON ccp.clp_uri = clp.clp_uri INNER JOIN paymentmethod pmt ON ccp.ccp_paymentmethod = pmt.pmt_uri AND (pmt.pmt_behaviour = 2)
TReportSQL.where: WHERE IFNULL(clp.clp_transferred, 0) = 0 AND ccp.ccp_paydate IS NULL AND (ccp.ccp_datlu BETWEEN :startdate AND :enddate )

TReportSQL.select: SELECT DISTINCT date_format(NOW(), '%d/%m/%Y') AS "DATE", grp_officialname AS "GROUP", cnt.cnt_idnr AS "ID", cnt.CNT_BNK_NAME AS "BANK NAME", cnt.CNT_BNK_BRANCH AS "BRANCH NAME", cnt.CNT_BNK_ACCNAME AS "ACCOUNT NAME", cnt.CNT_BNK_ACCNUMBER AS "ACCOUNT NUMBER", SUM(ccp_amountnett) AS "AMOUNT"
TReportSQL.from: FROM contactcollectionpayment ccp INNER JOIN contact cnt ON cnt.cnt_uri = ccp.cnt_uri INNER JOIN ( SELECT clp.clp_uri, grp_officialname FROM collectionpayment clp INNER JOIN groupcollectionpayment gcp ON clp.clp_uri = gcp.clp_uri INNER JOIN groupcollection gpc ON gcp.GPC_URI = gpc.GPC_URI INNER JOIN `groups` grp ON grp.grp_uri = gpc.GRP_URI INNER JOIN bankaccount bnk ON bnk.bnk_uri = grp.bnk_uri AND bnk.bnk_uri=(select SYS_VALUE FROM SYSPARAMS WHERE SYS_URI=20) WHERE IFNULL(clp_transferred, 0) = 0 AND ( clp.clp_crdate BETWEEN :startdate AND :enddate ) GROUP BY clp.clp_uri, grp.grp_uri ) b ON b.clp_uri = ccp.clp_uri INNER JOIN paymentmethod pmt ON ccp.ccp_paymentmethod = pmt.pmt_uri AND pmt.pmt_behaviour = 1
TReportSQL.where: WHERE ccp.ccp_paydate IS NULL

TReportSQL.select: SELECT DISTINCT grp.grp_officialname AS Group_Name, cnt.cnt_province AS ADMINLEVEL1, cnt.cnt_district AS ADMINLEVEL2, cnt.cnt_division AS ADMINLEVEL3, cnt.cnt_location AS ADMINLEVEL4, cnt.cnt_longname AS Farmer_Name, cnt.cnt_gender as Gender, DATE_FORMAT(cnt.cnt_dob, "%Y-%m-%d") as Birthdate, TIMESTAMPDIFF(YEAR, cnt.cnt_dob, CURDATE()) AS 'Age', cnt.cnt_phone as Phone, cnt.cnt_idnr AS KID, cnt.cnt_epid AS COOP_ID, cnt.cnt_organiccertno AS Selet_ID, REPLACE(cnt.cnt_gpslocation,',',';') AS "geopoint_farmer", -- must use ; otherwise cannot export to csv REPLACE(cnt.cnt_postal,',',';') AS "remark", -- must use ; otherwise cannot export to csv Convert('', Char(50)) AS deviceid, Convert('', Char(50)) AS land_cert, cnt.cnt_isvalidated as validated
TReportSQL.from: FROM contact cnt LEFT JOIN membership mbs ON mbs.cnt_uri = cnt.cnt_uri AND mbs.mst_uri=1 AND mbs.mem_end IS NULL LEFT JOIN `groups` grp ON mbs.grp_uri = grp.grp_uri AND mbs.mem_end IS NULL

TReportSQL.select: SELECT att_male.trn_date 'Training Date', grp_officialname 'Group Name', tmd_desc 'Module Name', tot_ 'Total Attendees', ifnull(tot_female,0) 'Attendees females', tot_-ifnull(tot_female,0) 'Attendees males' , CONCAT(ROUND((ifnull(tot_female,0)/(tot_) )*100), '%') 'Percentage females', psnname 'Trainer' FROM ( SELECT grp_officialname, trn_date, tng.grp_uri, tng.trn_uri, tmd_desc, COUNT(distinct att.cnt_uri) tot_, psn.PSN_NAME psnname
TReportSQL.from: FROM trainings tng INNER JOIN `groups` grp ON tng.GRP_URI = grp.GRP_URI INNER JOIN attendency att ON att.trn_uri = tng.trn_uri INNER JOIN contact cnt ON att.cnt_uri = cnt.cnt_uri INNER JOIN training trn ON att.TRN_URI =trn.trn_uri INNER JOIN trainingmodule tmd ON tmd.tmd_uri = trn.tmd_uri INNER JOIN personnel psn ON trn.PSN_URI = psn.PSN_URI WHERE TRN_DATE BETWEEN :startdate AND :enddate AND (tmd.tmd_uri = :tmd_uri or :tmd_uri = 0 ) AND (psn.psn_uri= :psn_uri or :psn_uri = 0 ) AND (grp.grp_uri = :grp_uri or :grp_uri = 0 ) GROUP BY grp.grp_uri,tng.trn_uri) att_male left join (SELECT tng.grp_uri, tng.trn_uri, COUNT(distinct att.cnt_uri) tot_female,TRN_DATE FROM trainings tng INNER JOIN `groups` grp ON tng.GRP_URI = grp.GRP_URI INNER JOIN attendency att ON att.trn_uri = tng.trn_uri INNER JOIN contact cnt ON att.cnt_uri = cnt.cnt_uri INNER JOIN training trn ON att.TRN_URI =trn.trn_uri INNER JOIN trainingmodule tmd ON tmd.tmd_uri = trn.tmd_uri INNER JOIN personnel psn ON trn.PSN_URI = psn.PSN_URI WHERE TRN_DATE BETWEEN :startdate AND :enddate AND (tmd.tmd_uri = :tmd_uri or :tmd_uri = 0 ) AND (psn.psn_uri= :psn_uri or :psn_uri =0) AND (grp.grp_uri = :grp_uri or :grp_uri = 0) AND cnt.cnt_gender = 'F' GROUP BY grp.grp_uri,tng.trn_uri HAVING COUNT(distinct att.cnt_uri) >= 1 OR COUNT(distinct att.cnt_uri) IS NULL ) att_female ON att_male.TRN_URI = att_female.trn_uri AND att_male.grp_uri = att_female.grp_uri

TReportSQL.select: SELECT DISTINCT 'Purchase' AS "Type", cnt.cnt_epid AS "AccountReference", ' ' AS "NominalAccount", ' ' AS "DepartmentCode", date_format(gcp.gcp_crdate, '%d/%m/%Y') AS "Date", gpc.GPC_NUMBER AS "Reference", crp.CRP_NAME AS "Details", sum(har.HAR_PAID) AS "NetAmount", ' ' AS "TaxCode", ' ' AS "TaxAmount", ' ' AS "ExchangeRate", CONCAT(clp.clp_reference , ' ' , cnt.cnt_epid) AS "ExtraReference", cnt.cnt_shortname AS "NameoftheFarmer", ' ' AS "ProjectRefn", ' ' AS "CostCodeRefn"
TReportSQL.from: FROM collectionpayment clp, groupcollectionpayment gcp, groupcollection gpc, harvest har, contact cnt, crop crp
TReportSQL.where: WHERE clp.clp_uri = gcp.clp_uri AND gpc.gpc_uri = gcp.gpc_uri AND har.gpc_uri = gpc.gpc_uri AND cnt.cnt_uri = har.cnt_uri AND har.crp_uri = crp.crp_uri AND gcp.gcp_crdate BETWEEN :startdate AND :enddate AND IFNULL(clp_transferred,0) = 0
TReportSQL.groupby: GROUP BY cnt.cnt_epid, gcp.gcp_crdate, gpc.GPC_NUMBER, crp.CRP_NAME, cnt.cnt_shortname, CONCAT(clp.clp_reference , ' ' , cnt.cnt_epid)

TReportSQL.select: SELECT DISTINCT 'Purchase' AS "Type", cnt.cnt_epid AS "AccountReference", gpc.GPC_NUMBER AS "Reference", crp.CRP_NAME AS "NameofCrop", sum(har.HAR_PAID) AS "NetAmount", CONCAT(clp.clp_reference , ' ' , cnt.cnt_epid) AS "ExtraReference", grp.grp_name AS "NameoftheGroup", DATE_FORMAT(gpc.gpc_date, '%d/%m/%Y') AS "CollectionDate", clr.clr_name AS "Route", gpc.gpc_amount AS "Kg"
TReportSQL.from: FROM collectionpayment clp, groupcollectionpayment gcp, groupcollection gpc, harvest har, contact cnt, `groups` grp, groupcropcollectionroute gcr, collectionroute clr, membership mst, crop crp
TReportSQL.where: WHERE clp.clp_uri = gcp.clp_uri AND gpc.gpc_uri = gcp.gpc_uri AND har.gpc_uri = gpc.gpc_uri AND cnt.cnt_uri = har.cnt_uri AND har.crp_uri = crp.crp_uri AND grp.grp_uri = gcr.grp_uri AND mst.cnt_uri = cnt.cnt_uri AND mst.grp_uri = grp.grp_uri AND clr.clr_uri = gcr.clr_uri AND mst.mst_uri = 1 AND mst.mem_end is null AND gpc.gpc_date BETWEEN :startdate AND :enddate AND IFNULL(clp_transferred,0) = 0
TReportSQL.groupby: GROUP BY cnt.cnt_epid, gpc.GPC_NUMBER, crp.CRP_NAME, clp.clp_reference, grp.grp_name, gpc.gpc_date, clr.clr_name, gpc.gpc_amount

TReportSQL.select: SELECT IF(cnt.cnt_bnk_accname IS NULL OR cnt.cnt_bnk_accname= '', cnt.cnt_shortname, cnt.cnt_bnk_accname) AS "Name of Beneficiary", CONCAT(cnt.cnt_bnk_name,' ',cnt.cnt_bnk_branch) AS "Bank and Branch", CONCAT(cnt.cnt_bnk_bankcode,cnt.cnt_bnk_branchcode) AS "Bank Clearing Code", cnt.cnt_bnk_accnumber AS "Credit Account", SUM(ccp.ccp_amountnett) AS "Credit Amount", CAST(GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT clp.clp_reference) AS CHAR) AS "Payment Details", (select sys_value from sysparams where sys_uri= 24) AS "Name of FPO"
TReportSQL.from: FROM contactcollectionpayment ccp INNER JOIN contact cnt ON cnt.cnt_uri = ccp.cnt_uri INNER JOIN collectionpayment clp ON ccp.clp_uri = clp.clp_uri INNER JOIN paymentmethod pmt ON ccp.ccp_paymentmethod = pmt.pmt_uri AND pmt.pmt_behaviour = 1
TReportSQL.where: WHERE IFNULL(clp.clp_transferred, 0) = 0 AND ccp.ccp_paydate IS NULL

TReportSQL.select: SELECT grp.grp_code AS "Group code", grp.grp_officialname AS "Group name", gtp.gtp_desc AS "Group type", (SELECT CAST(GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT psn.psn_longname) AS CHAR) FROM staffgrouprole sgr INNER JOIN personnel psn ON psn.psn_uri = sgr.psn_uri WHERE sgr.grp_uri=grp.grp_uri AND sgr.rtt_uri=1) AS 'Extension officer', grp.grp_country AS "COUNTRY", grp.grp_province AS "ADMINLEVEL1", grp.grp_district AS "ADMINLEVEL2", grp.grp_division AS "ADMINLEVEL3", grp.grp_location AS "ADMINLEVEL4", grp.grp_village AS "ADMINLEVEL5", EXTRACTVALUE(grp_gpslocation, '/TCSLocation') AS "Group GPS coordinates", IFNULL(SUM(cnt.cnt_active = 1),0) AS "Active farmers", IFNULL(SUM(cnt.cnt_active = 0),0) AS "Inactive farmers", COUNT(cnt.cnt_uri) AS "Total farmers"
TReportSQL.from: FROM `groups` grp LEFT JOIN staffgrouprole sgr ON sgr.grp_uri=grp.grp_uri LEFT JOIN personnel psn ON psn.psn_uri = sgr.psn_uri LEFT JOIN grouptype gtp ON gtp.gtp_uri = grp.gtp_uri LEFT JOIN membership mem ON mem.grp_uri = grp.grp_uri AND mem.mst_uri = 1 AND mem.mem_start <= NOW() AND (mem.mem_end IS NULL OR mem.mem_end >= NOW()) LEFT JOIN contact cnt ON mem.cnt_uri = cnt.cnt_uri
TReportSQL.where: WHERE (1=1) AND (( psn.PSN_URI = :psn_uri ) OR ( :psn_uri = 0 ))
TReportSQL.groupby: GROUP BY grp.grp_code, grp.grp_name, grp.grp_officialname, gtp.gtp_desc, grp.grp_country, grp.grp_province, grp.grp_district, grp.grp_division, grp.grp_location, grp.grp_village

TReportSQL.select: SELECT CAST( GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT date_format(clp.clp_paydate, '%d/%m/%Y')) AS CHAR)AS "Date", cnt.cnt_idnr AS "ID Number", IF(cnt.cnt_bnk_accname IS NULL OR cnt.cnt_bnk_accname= '', cnt.cnt_shortname, cnt.cnt_bnk_accname) AS "Account Name", cnt.cnt_bnk_accnumber AS "Account Number", SUM(ccp.ccp_amountnett) AS "Amount", CAST(GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT clp.clp_reference) AS CHAR) AS "Reference"
TReportSQL.from: FROM contactcollectionpayment ccp INNER JOIN contact cnt ON cnt.cnt_uri = ccp.cnt_uri INNER JOIN collectionpayment clp ON ccp.clp_uri = clp.clp_uri INNER JOIN paymentmethod pmt ON ccp.ccp_paymentmethod = pmt.pmt_uri AND pmt.pmt_behaviour = 1
TReportSQL.where: WHERE IFNULL(clp.clp_transferred, 0) = 0 AND ccp.ccp_paydate IS NULL

TReportSQL.select: SELECT IF(cnt.cnt_bnk_accname IS NULL OR cnt.cnt_bnk_accname= '', cnt.cnt_shortname, cnt.cnt_bnk_accname) AS "Name", IFNULL ( NULLIF( TRIM(TRAILING SUBSTRING_INDEX(REPLACE(REPLACE(cnt.CNT_PHONE,'/', ','),' ', ''), ',', -1) FROM SUBSTRING_INDEX(REPLACE( REPLACE(cnt.CNT_PHONE,',', ''),'/', ''),' ',1) ), ''), cnt.CNT_PHONE ) AS 'Telephone number ', SUM(ccp.ccp_amountnett) AS "Amount"
TReportSQL.from: FROM contactcollectionpayment ccp INNER JOIN contact cnt ON cnt.cnt_uri = ccp.cnt_uri INNER JOIN collectionpayment clp ON ccp.clp_uri = clp.clp_uri INNER JOIN paymentmethod pmt ON ccp.ccp_paymentmethod = pmt.pmt_uri AND pmt.pmt_behaviour = 2
TReportSQL.where: WHERE IFNULL(clp.clp_transferred, 0) = 0 AND ccp.ccp_paydate IS NULL

TReportSQL.select: SELECT ' ' AS "Provider", SUM(ccp.ccp_amountnett) AS "Amount", (select sys_value from sysparams where sys_uri= 16 ) AS "Currency", :wallet AS "Wallet", IFNULL ( NULLIF( TRIM(TRAILING SUBSTRING_INDEX(REPLACE(REPLACE(cnt.CNT_PHONE,'/', ','),' ', ''), ',', -1) FROM SUBSTRING_INDEX(REPLACE( REPLACE(cnt.CNT_PHONE,',', ''),'/', ''),' ',1) ), ''), cnt.CNT_PHONE ) AS "Recipient Account", cnt.cnt_shortname AS "Recipient Name", date_format(cnt.cnt_dob, '%d/%m/%Y') AS "Birth Date", CAST(GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT clp.clp_reference) AS CHAR) AS "Reason"
TReportSQL.from: FROM contactcollectionpayment ccp INNER JOIN contact cnt ON cnt.cnt_uri = ccp.cnt_uri INNER JOIN collectionpayment clp ON ccp.clp_uri = clp.clp_uri INNER JOIN paymentmethod pmt ON ccp.ccp_paymentmethod = pmt.pmt_uri AND pmt.pmt_behaviour = 1
TReportSQL.where: WHERE IFNULL(clp.clp_transferred, 0) = 0 AND ccp.ccp_paydate IS NULL

TReportSQL.select: SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT clp.clp_reference) AS "Reference Number", CAST(GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT clp.clp_reference) AS CHAR) AS "PaymentDetails", cnt.cnt_bnk_accnumber AS "Account", cnt.cnt_bnk_name AS "Bank Name", cnt.cnt_bnk_branch AS "Branch", cnt.cnt_bnk_bankcode AS "Bank Code", cnt.cnt_bnk_branchcode "Branch Code", SUM(ccp.ccp_amountnett) AS "Amount"
TReportSQL.from: FROM contactcollectionpayment ccp INNER JOIN contact cnt ON cnt.cnt_uri = ccp.cnt_uri INNER JOIN collectionpayment clp ON ccp.clp_uri = clp.clp_uri INNER JOIN paymentmethod pmt ON ccp.ccp_paymentmethod = pmt.pmt_uri AND pmt.pmt_behaviour = 1
TReportSQL.where: WHERE IFNULL(clp.clp_transferred, 0) = 0 AND ccp.ccp_paydate IS NULL

TReportSQL.select: SELECT CONCAT(cast(date_format(NOW(), '%d%m%Y') as char), CAST(GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT clp.clp_reference ) AS CHAR) ) AS "Document Number", 'XYZ' AS LICID, cnt.cnt_epid AS "Supplier Code", ' ' AS "Due Date", SUM(ccp.ccp_amountnett) AS "Amount", (select sys_value from sysparams where sys_uri= 16 ) AS "Currency", CAST(GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT (date_format(clp.clp_crdate, '%d/%m/%Y'))) AS CHAR) AS "Issue Date", ' ' AS "Request Date Time", CAST(GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT clp.clp_reference ) AS CHAR) AS "Invoice ID"
TReportSQL.from: FROM contactcollectionpayment ccp INNER JOIN contact cnt ON cnt.cnt_uri = ccp.cnt_uri INNER JOIN collectionpayment clp ON ccp.clp_uri = clp.clp_uri INNER JOIN paymentmethod pmt ON ccp.ccp_paymentmethod = pmt.pmt_uri AND pmt.pmt_behaviour = 1
TReportSQL.where: WHERE IFNULL(clp.clp_transferred, 0) = 0 AND ccp.ccp_paydate IS NULL

TReportSQL.select: SELECT ' ' AS "From Account", ' ' AS "Account Name", cnt.cnt_shortname AS "Beneficiary Name", IFNULL(NULLIF(TRIM(TRAILING SUBSTRING_INDEX(REPLACE (REPLACE ( cnt.CNT_PHONE, '/', ','), ' ', ''), ',', - 1) FROM SUBSTRING_INDEX(REPLACE (REPLACE (cnt.CNT_PHONE, ',', ''), '/', ''), ' ', 1)), ''), cnt.CNT_PHONE) AS "Mobile Number", ' ' AS "Mobile Service Provider", SUM(ccp.ccp_amountnett) AS "Amount", (select sys_value from sysparams where sys_uri= 16 ) AS "Currency", CONCAT(GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT (date_format(clp.clp_paydate, '%d%m%Y')) SEPARATOR '') , cnt.cnt_epid) AS "MyReference", CAST(GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT (clp.clp_reference)) AS CHAR) AS "Beneficiary Reference"
TReportSQL.from: FROM contactcollectionpayment ccp INNER JOIN contact cnt ON cnt.cnt_uri = ccp.cnt_uri INNER JOIN collectionpayment clp ON ccp.clp_uri = clp.clp_uri INNER JOIN paymentmethod pmt ON ccp.ccp_paymentmethod = pmt.pmt_uri AND pmt.pmt_behaviour = 1
TReportSQL.where: WHERE IFNULL(clp.clp_transferred, 0) = 0 AND ccp.ccp_paydate IS NULL

TReportSQL.select: SELECT intt.int_uri, intt.int_name AS 'Template name', ins.ins_uri , ins.ins_date AS 'Planned date', ins.ins_date_completion AS 'Completion date', psn.psn_longname as 'Extension officer', grp.grp_uri, grp.grp_officialname AS 'Group name', EXTRACTVALUE(grp.grp_gpslocation, '/TCSLocation') AS "Group GPS coordinates", cnt.cnt_uri, cnt.cnt_epid AS 'EPID', cnt.cnt_longname AS 'Farmer name', EXTRACTVALUE(cnt.cnt_gpslocation, '/TCSLocation') AS "Farmer GPS coordinates", EXTRACTVALUE(ins.ins_gpslocation, '/TCSLocation') AS "Survey GPS coordinates", itq.itq_uri, itq.itq_desc AS question, ina.ina_uri, CONCAT(COALESCE(ina.ina_shorttext, ''), COALESCE(ina.ina_longtext, ''), COALESCE(ina.ina_amount, ''), COALESCE(DATE(ina.ina_date), '')) AS answer
TReportSQL.from: FROM inspection ins INNER JOIN inspectiontemplate intt ON intt.int_uri = ins.int_uri INNER JOIN ins_cnt ON ins_cnt.ins_uri=ins.ins_uri INNER JOIN contact cnt ON cnt.cnt_uri = ins_cnt.cnt_uri LEFT JOIN membership mbs ON mbs.cnt_uri = cnt.cnt_uri AND mbs.mst_uri=1 LEFT JOIN `groups` grp ON mbs.grp_uri = grp.grp_uri AND mbs.mem_end IS NULL INNER JOIN templategroup tpg ON tpg.int_uri = intt.int_uri INNER JOIN inspectiontemplatequestion itq ON itq.tpg_uri = tpg.tpg_uri INNER JOIN questiontype qty ON qty.qty_uri = itq.qty_uri INNER JOIN personnel psn ON psn.psn_uri = ins.PSN_URI LEFT OUTER JOIN inspectionanswer ina ON ina.itq_uri = itq.itq_uri AND ina.ins_uri = ins.ins_uri
TReportSQL.where: WHERE ins.ins_status='E' AND qty.qty_code <> 'NONE' AND (grp.grp_uri = :grp_uri or :grp_uri = 0) AND COALESCE(mbs.mem_end, ins.ins_date) >= ins.ins_date AND COALESCE(mbs.mem_start, ins.ins_date) <= ins.ins_date AND ( ins.ins_date_completion BETWEEN :startdate AND :enddate ) AND ( :org_uri = 0 OR (grp.grp_uri IN ( SELECT ogm.grp_uri FROM orggroupmembership ogm WHERE ( ogm.org_uri = :org_uri ) AND ( ogm.ogm_end is NULL ) )))
TReportSQL.orderby: ORDER BY ins.ins_date, grp.grp_officialname, cnt.cnt_longname, ins.ins_uri, tpg.tpg_order, itq.itq_order, ina.ina_uri

TReportSQL.select: SELECT IFNULL(NULLIF(TRIM(TRAILING SUBSTRING_INDEX(REPLACE (REPLACE ( cnt.CNT_PHONE, '/', ','), ' ', ''), ',', - 1) FROM SUBSTRING_INDEX(REPLACE (REPLACE (cnt.CNT_PHONE, ',', ''), '/', ''), ' ', 1)), ''), cnt.CNT_PHONE) AS phonenumber, SUM(ccp.ccp_amountnett) AS 'Amount'
TReportSQL.from: FROM contactcollectionpayment ccp INNER JOIN contact cnt ON ccp.cnt_uri = cnt.CNT_URI INNER JOIN collectionpayment clp ON clp.clp_uri = ccp.clp_uri INNER JOIN paymentmethod pmt ON ccp.ccp_paymentmethod = pmt.pmt_uri AND pmt.pmt_behaviour = 2
TReportSQL.where: WHERE IFNULL(clp.clp_transferred,0) = 0 AND ccp.ccp_paydate IS NULL

TReportSQL.select: SELECT ' ' AS "Debit Account No.", cnt.CNT_LONGNAME AS "Beneficiary Name", (SELECT sys_value FROM sysparams WHERE sys_uri= 16) AS "Transaction Currency", SUM(ccp.ccp_amountnett) AS "Payment Amount", ' ' AS "Service Provider", IFNULL(NULLIF(TRIM(TRAILING SUBSTRING_INDEX(REPLACE (REPLACE ( cnt.CNT_PHONE, '/', ','), ' ', ''), ',', - 1) FROM SUBSTRING_INDEX(REPLACE (REPLACE (cnt.CNT_PHONE, ',', ''), '/', ''), ' ', 1)), ''), cnt.CNT_PHONE) AS "Beneficiary Mobile No."
TReportSQL.from: FROM contactcollectionpayment ccp INNER JOIN contact cnt ON cnt.cnt_uri = ccp.cnt_uri INNER JOIN collectionpayment clp ON ccp.clp_uri = clp.clp_uri INNER JOIN paymentmethod pmt ON ccp.ccp_paymentmethod = pmt.pmt_uri AND pmt.pmt_behaviour = 2
TReportSQL.where: WHERE IFNULL(clp.clp_transferred, 0) = 0 AND ccp.ccp_paydate IS NULL
