TReportSQL.select: SELECT ' ' AS "Credit Identity String Type", REPLACE(IFNULL(NULLIF(TRIM(TRAILING SUBSTRING_INDEX(REPLACE (REPLACE ( cnt.CNT_PHONE, '/', ','), ' ', ''), ',', - 1) FROM SUBSTRING_INDEX( REPLACE (REPLACE (cnt.CNT_PHONE, ',', ''), '/', ''), ' ', 1)), ''), cnt.CNT_PHONE),'+','') AS "Credit Identity String", ' ' AS "Validation Identity String Type", ' ' AS "Validation Identity String", SUM(ccp.ccp_amountnett) AS "Amount", cnt.CNT_LONGNAME AS "Comment"
TReportSQL.from: FROM contactcollectionpayment ccp INNER JOIN contact cnt ON cnt.cnt_uri = ccp.cnt_uri INNER JOIN collectionpayment clp ON clp.clp_uri = ccp.clp_uri INNER JOIN paymentmethod pmt ON ccp.ccp_paymentmethod = pmt.pmt_uri AND pmt.pmt_behaviour = 1
TReportSQL.where: WHERE IFNULL(clp.clp_transferred, 0) = 0 AND ccp.ccp_paydate IS NULL

TReportSQL.select: SELECT 'BT' AS 'TransactionTypeCode', :Debit_Acc AS 'DebitAccountNo.', if(cnt.CNT_BNK_NAME <> ' ', cnt.CNT_BNK_ACCNUMBER, ' ') AS 'BeneficiaryAccountNo.', if(cnt.CNT_BNK_NAME <> ' ', cnt.CNT_BNK_ACCNAME, cnt.CNT_LONGNAME) AS 'Beneficiary Name', cnt.CNT_BNK_BRANCHCODE AS 'BeneficiaryBankSwiftCode/LocalBankCode', ' ' AS 'PurposeCode', (select sys_value from sysparams where sys_uri = 16 ) AS 'TransactionCurrency', SUM(ccp.ccp_amountnett) AS 'PaymentAmount', ' ' AS 'PaymentType', ' ' AS 'ServiceProvider', ' ' AS 'BeneficiaryMobileNo.'
TReportSQL.from: FROM contactcollectionpayment ccp INNER JOIN contact cnt ON cnt.cnt_uri = ccp.cnt_uri INNER JOIN collectionpayment clp ON ccp.clp_uri = clp.clp_uri INNER JOIN paymentmethod pmt ON ccp.ccp_paymentmethod = pmt.pmt_uri AND pmt.pmt_behaviour = 1
TReportSQL.where: WHERE IFNULL(clp.clp_transferred, 0) = 0 AND ccp.ccp_paydate IS NULL

TReportSQL.select: SELECT 'MW' AS 'TransactionTypeCode', :DebitAccountNo AS 'DebitAccountNo.', ' ' AS 'BeneficiaryAccountNo.', cnt.CNT_LONGNAME AS 'Beneficiary Name', ' ' AS 'BeneficiaryBankSwiftCode/LocalBankCode', ' ' AS 'PurposeCode', (select sys_value from sysparams where sys_uri= 16 ) AS 'TransactionCurrency', SUM(ccp.ccp_amountnett) AS 'PaymentAmount', ' ' AS 'PaymentType', ' ' AS 'ServiceProvider', IFNULL ( NULLIF( TRIM(TRAILING SUBSTRING_INDEX(REPLACE(REPLACE(cnt.CNT_PHONE,'/', ','),' ', ''), ',', -1) FROM SUBSTRING_INDEX(REPLACE( REPLACE(cnt.CNT_PHONE,',', ''),'/', ''),' ',1) ), ''), cnt.CNT_PHONE ) AS 'BeneficiaryMobileNo.'
TReportSQL.from: FROM contactcollectionpayment ccp INNER JOIN contact cnt ON cnt.cnt_uri = ccp.cnt_uri INNER JOIN collectionpayment clp ON ccp.clp_uri = clp.clp_uri INNER JOIN paymentmethod pmt ON ccp.ccp_paymentmethod = pmt.pmt_uri AND pmt.pmt_behaviour = 2
TReportSQL.where: WHERE IFNULL(clp.clp_transferred, 0) = 0 AND ccp.ccp_paydate IS NULL

TReportSQL.select: SELECT prd.PRD_NAME AS 'Product name', CASE WHEN prd.prd_type = 1 THEN 'monetary' WHEN prd.prd_type = 2 THEN 'stock input' WHEN prd.prd_type = 3 THEN 'stock output' end AS 'Product type', crp.CRP_NAME AS 'Produce origin', acc.acc_name AS 'Account name', IF(acc.acc_receiveonly=1,'Use','Stock') AS 'Account type', afs.afs_balance AS 'Account balance', CONCAT(IF (prd.prd_weight <> 1, CONCAT(prd.PRD_WEIGHT,' '), ''), unt.UNT_NAME ) AS 'Unit', psn.psn_longname AS 'Staff name', psn.psn_function AS 'Staff function', afs.afs_lastupdate AS 'Last transaction'
TReportSQL.from: FROM product prd INNER JOIN account acc ON acc.prd_uri = prd.prd_uri INNER JOIN unit unt ON unt.UNT_URI = prd.unt_uri left JOIN crop crp ON crp.CRP_URI = prd.crp_uri INNER JOIN accountforstaff afs ON afs.acc_uri = acc.acc_uri INNER JOIN personnel psn ON psn.psn_uri = afs.psn_uri
TReportSQL.where: WHERE ((prd.prd_uri = :prd_uri ) OR ( :prd_uri = 0)) AND (afs.afs_lastupdate BETWEEN :startdate AND :enddate )

TReportSQL.select: SELECT cnt.cnt_province AS 'REGION/COUNTY', cnt.cnt_longname AS 'EMPLOYEE', cnt.cnt_bnk_accnumber AS 'POSTBANK ACC', cnt.CNT_IDNR AS 'ID NUMBER', IFNULL ( NULLIF(TRIM(TRAILING SUBSTRING_INDEX(REPLACE(REPLACE(cnt.CNT_PHONE,'/', ','),' ', ''), ',', -1) FROM SUBSTRING_INDEX(REPLACE( REPLACE(cnt.CNT_PHONE,',', ''),'/', ''),' ',1) ), ''), cnt.CNT_PHONE ) AS 'CONTACT', SUM(ccp.ccp_amountnett) AS 'AMOUNT'
TReportSQL.from: FROM contactcollectionpayment ccp INNER JOIN contact cnt ON cnt.cnt_uri = ccp.cnt_uri INNER JOIN collectionpayment clp ON ccp.clp_uri = clp.clp_uri INNER JOIN paymentmethod pmt ON ccp.ccp_paymentmethod = pmt.pmt_uri AND pmt.pmt_behaviour = 1
TReportSQL.where: WHERE IFNULL(clp.clp_transferred, 0) = 0 AND ccp.ccp_paydate IS NULL AND cnt.cnt_bnk_bankcode = '62' AND cnt.cnt_bnk_name = 'Post Office Bank' AND left(cnt.cnt_bnk_accnumber, 4) = '0744'

TReportSQL.select: SELECT cnt.cnt_epid AS EPID, IFNULL (NULLIF(TRIM(TRAILING SUBSTRING_INDEX(REPLACE(REPLACE(cnt.CNT_PHONE,'/', ','),' ', ''), ',', -1) FROM SUBSTRING_INDEX(REPLACE(REPLACE(cnt.CNT_PHONE,',', ''),'/', ''),' ',1) ), ''),cnt.CNT_PHONE) AS 'PhoneNumber', SUM(ccp.ccp_amountnett) AS 'Amount', ' ' AS 'Comment'
TReportSQL.from: FROM contactcollectionpayment ccp INNER JOIN contact cnt ON cnt.cnt_uri = ccp.cnt_uri INNER JOIN collectionpayment clp ON ccp.clp_uri = clp.clp_uri INNER JOIN paymentmethod pmt ON ccp.ccp_paymentmethod = pmt.pmt_uri AND pmt.pmt_behaviour = 2
TReportSQL.where: WHERE IFNULL(clp.clp_transferred, 0) = 0 AND ccp.ccp_paydate IS NULL

TReportSQL.select: SELECT cnt.CNT_LONGNAME AS 'Beneficiary Name', :Acc_No AS 'Account number', :Sortcode AS 'Sort code', SUM(ccp.ccp_amountnett) AS 'Amount', REPLACE(IFNULL (NULLIF(TRIM(TRAILING SUBSTRING_INDEX( REPLACE( REPLACE(cnt.CNT_PHONE,'/', ','),' ', ''), ',', -1) FROM SUBSTRING_INDEX( REPLACE( REPLACE(cnt.CNT_PHONE,',', ''),'/', ''),' ',1) ), ''), cnt.CNT_PHONE ),'+','') AS 'Beneficiary reference'
TReportSQL.from: FROM contactcollectionpayment ccp INNER JOIN contact cnt ON cnt.cnt_uri = ccp.cnt_uri INNER JOIN collectionpayment clp ON ccp.clp_uri = clp.clp_uri INNER JOIN paymentmethod pmt ON ccp.ccp_paymentmethod = pmt.pmt_uri AND pmt.pmt_behaviour = 2
TReportSQL.where: WHERE IFNULL(clp.clp_transferred, 0) = 0 AND ccp.ccp_paydate IS NULL

TReportSQL.select: SELECT cnt.CNT_LONGNAME AS 'Beneficiary Name', cnt.CNT_BNK_ACCNUMBER AS 'Account number', CONCAT(cnt.CNT_BNK_BANKCODE, cnt.CNT_BNK_BRANCHCODE) AS 'Sort code', SUM(ccp.ccp_amountnett) AS 'Amount', GROUP_CONCAT(clp.CLP_REFERENCE) AS "Beneficiary reference"
TReportSQL.from: FROM contactcollectionpayment ccp INNER JOIN contact cnt ON cnt.cnt_uri = ccp.cnt_uri INNER JOIN collectionpayment clp ON ccp.clp_uri = clp.clp_uri INNER JOIN paymentmethod pmt ON ccp.ccp_paymentmethod = pmt.pmt_uri AND pmt.pmt_behaviour = 1
TReportSQL.where: WHERE IFNULL(clp.clp_transferred, 0) = 0 AND ccp.ccp_paydate IS NULL

TReportSQL.select: SELECT cnt.cnt_longname AS 'Payee name', IFNULL (NULLIF(TRIM(TRAILING SUBSTRING_INDEX(REPLACE(REPLACE(cnt.CNT_PHONE,'/', ','),' ', ''), ',', -1) FROM SUBSTRING_INDEX(REPLACE(REPLACE(cnt.CNT_PHONE,',', ''),'/', ''),' ',1) ), ''),cnt.CNT_PHONE) AS 'Payee mobileNo', SUM(ccp.ccp_amountnett) AS 'Amount', GROUP_CONCAT(clp.CLP_REFERENCE) AS "Reference"
TReportSQL.from: FROM contactcollectionpayment ccp INNER JOIN contact cnt ON cnt.cnt_uri = ccp.cnt_uri INNER JOIN collectionpayment clp ON ccp.clp_uri = clp.clp_uri INNER JOIN paymentmethod pmt ON ccp.ccp_paymentmethod = pmt.pmt_uri AND pmt.pmt_behaviour = 1
TReportSQL.where: WHERE IFNULL(clp.clp_transferred, 0) = 0 AND ccp.ccp_paydate IS NULL

TReportSQL.select: SELECT cnt.cnt_longname AS 'Name', cnt.CNT_IDNR AS 'IDNumber', ' ' AS 'FPO Account', SUM(ccp.ccp_amountnett) AS 'DR AMNT', SUM(ccp.ccp_amountnett) AS 'CR AMNT', CAST(GROUP_CONCAT(dum.Narration SEPARATOR '-') AS CHAR) AS 'Details', cnt.CNT_BNK_ACCNUMBER AS 'Customer AC Number', IFNULL(NULLIF(TRIM(TRAILING SUBSTRING_INDEX(REPLACE (REPLACE (cnt.CNT_PHONE, '/', ','), ' ', ''), ',', - 1) FROM SUBSTRING_INDEX(REPLACE (REPLACE (cnt.CNT_PHONE, ',', ''), '/', ''), ' ', 1)), ''), cnt.CNT_PHONE) AS 'Mobile Number'
TReportSQL.from: FROM contactcollectionpayment ccp INNER JOIN contact cnt ON cnt.cnt_uri = ccp.cnt_uri INNER JOIN collectionpayment clp ON ccp.clp_uri = clp.clp_uri INNER JOIN ( SELECT clp_uri, GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT GPC_NUMBER SEPARATOR '-') AS Narration FROM groupcollectionpayment gcp INNER JOIN groupcollection gpc ON gcp.gpc_uri = gpc.gpc_uri GROUP BY clp_uri) dum ON dum.clp_uri = clp.clp_uri INNER JOIN paymentmethod pmt ON ccp.ccp_paymentmethod = pmt.pmt_uri AND pmt.pmt_behaviour = 1
TReportSQL.where: WHERE IFNULL(clp.clp_transferred, 0) = 0 AND ccp.ccp_paydate IS NULL

TReportSQL.select: SET @row_num = 0; SELECT (@row_num := @row_num +1) AS 'Beneficiary code', cnt.cnt_longname AS 'Beneficiary name', 'Mobile payment' AS 'Payment method', IFNULL (NULLIF(TRIM(TRAILING SUBSTRING_INDEX( REPLACE( REPLACE(cnt.CNT_PHONE,'/', ','),' ', ''), ',', -1) FROM SUBSTRING_INDEX( REPLACE( REPLACE(cnt.CNT_PHONE,',', ''),'/', ''),' ',1) ), ''), cnt.CNT_PHONE ) AS 'Mobile number', 'Mpesa' AS 'Service Code', SUM(ccp.ccp_amountnett) AS 'Amount', 'Farmer Payment' AS 'Payment purpose', if((SELECT sysparams.sys_value FROM sysparams WHERE sysparams.SYS_URI = 16) = 'KSH', 'KES', (SELECT sysparams.sys_value FROM sysparams WHERE sysparams.SYS_URI = 16)) AS 'Cur', ' ' AS 'Debit account', current_date AS 'Execution date'
TReportSQL.from: FROM contactcollectionpayment ccp INNER JOIN contact cnt ON ccp.cnt_uri = cnt.CNT_URI INNER JOIN collectionpayment clp ON clp.clp_uri = ccp.clp_uri INNER JOIN paymentmethod pmt ON ccp.ccp_paymentmethod = pmt.pmt_uri AND pmt.pmt_behaviour = 1
TReportSQL.where: WHERE IFNULL(clp.clp_transferred,0) = 0 AND ccp.ccp_paydate IS NULL

TReportSQL.select: SELECT cnt.CNT_LONGNAME AS 'Beneficiary', IFNULL(NULLIF(TRIM(TRAILING SUBSTRING_INDEX(REPLACE (REPLACE (cnt.CNT_PHONE, '/', ','), ' ', ''), ',', - 1) FROM SUBSTRING_INDEX(REPLACE (REPLACE (cnt.CNT_PHONE, ',', ''), '/', ''), ' ', 1)), ''), cnt.CNT_PHONE) AS 'Telephone number', SUM(ccp.ccp_amountnett) AS 'Amount', CAST(GROUP_CONCAT(dum.Narration SEPARATOR '-') AS CHAR) AS 'Narration'
TReportSQL.from: FROM contactcollectionpayment ccp INNER JOIN contact cnt ON cnt.cnt_uri = ccp.cnt_uri INNER JOIN collectionpayment clp ON ccp.clp_uri = clp.clp_uri INNER JOIN ( SELECT clp_uri, GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT GPC_NUMBER SEPARATOR '-') AS Narration FROM groupcollectionpayment gcp INNER JOIN groupcollection gpc ON gcp.gpc_uri = gpc.gpc_uri GROUP BY clp_uri) dum ON dum.clp_uri = clp.clp_uri INNER JOIN paymentmethod pmt ON ccp.ccp_paymentmethod = pmt.pmt_uri AND pmt.pmt_behaviour = 1
TReportSQL.where: WHERE IFNULL(clp.clp_transferred, 0) = 0 AND ccp.ccp_paydate IS NULL

TReportSQL.select: SELECT IFNULL(NULLIF(TRIM(TRAILING SUBSTRING_INDEX(REPLACE (REPLACE (cnt.CNT_PHONE, '/', ','), ' ', ''), ',', - 1) FROM SUBSTRING_INDEX(REPLACE (REPLACE (cnt.CNT_PHONE, ',', ''), '/', ''), ' ', 1)), ''), cnt.CNT_PHONE) AS 'Phone number', SUM(ccp.ccp_amountnett) AS 'Amount', CAST(GROUP_CONCAT(dum.Narration SEPARATOR '-')AS CHAR) AS 'Narration'
TReportSQL.from: FROM contactcollectionpayment ccp INNER JOIN contact cnt ON cnt.cnt_uri = ccp.cnt_uri INNER JOIN collectionpayment clp ON ccp.clp_uri = clp.clp_uri INNER JOIN ( SELECT clp_uri, GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT GPC_NUMBER SEPARATOR '-') AS Narration FROM groupcollectionpayment gcp INNER JOIN groupcollection gpc ON gcp.gpc_uri = gpc.gpc_uri GROUP BY clp_uri) dum ON dum.clp_uri = clp.clp_uri INNER JOIN paymentmethod pmt ON ccp.ccp_paymentmethod = pmt.pmt_uri AND pmt.pmt_behaviour = 1
TReportSQL.where: WHERE IFNULL(clp.clp_transferred, 0) = 0 AND ccp.ccp_paydate IS NULL

TReportSQL.select: SELECT SUM(ccp.ccp_amountnett) AS 'Amount', 'Mobile Payment' AS 'Payment type', cnt.CNT_LONGNAME AS 'Beneficiary name', IFNULL(NULLIF(TRIM(TRAILING SUBSTRING_INDEX(REPLACE (REPLACE (cnt.CNT_PHONE, '/', ','), ' ', ''), ',', - 1) FROM SUBSTRING_INDEX(REPLACE (REPLACE (cnt.CNT_PHONE, ',', ''), '/', ''), ' ', 1)), ''), cnt.CNT_PHONE) AS 'Mobile number', ' ' AS 'Network type', CONCAT(cnt.CNT_BNK_BANKCODE, cnt.CNT_BNK_BRANCHCODE) AS 'Clearing code', ' ' AS 'Swift code', CAST(GROUP_CONCAT(Narration SEPARATOR '-') AS CHAR) AS 'Payment descriptions', 'Farmer payment' AS 'Payment purpose'
TReportSQL.from: FROM contactcollectionpayment ccp INNER JOIN contact cnt ON cnt.cnt_uri = ccp.cnt_uri INNER JOIN collectionpayment clp ON ccp.clp_uri = clp.clp_uri INNER JOIN ( SELECT clp_uri, GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT GPC_NUMBER SEPARATOR '-') AS Narration FROM groupcollectionpayment gcp INNER JOIN groupcollection gpc ON gcp.gpc_uri = gpc.gpc_uri GROUP BY clp_uri) dum ON dum.clp_uri = clp.clp_uri INNER JOIN paymentmethod pmt ON ccp.ccp_paymentmethod = pmt.pmt_uri AND pmt.pmt_behaviour = 2
TReportSQL.where: WHERE IFNULL(clp.clp_transferred, 0) = 0 AND ccp.ccp_paydate IS NULL

TReportSQL.select: SELECT SUM(ccp.ccp_amountnett) AS 'Amount', 'EFP' AS 'Payment type', cnt.CNT_LONGNAME AS 'Beneficiary name', cnt.CNT_BNK_ACCNUMBER AS 'Account number', ' ' AS 'Clearing code', ' ' AS 'Swift code', CAST( GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT clp_reference SEPARATOR '-') AS CHAR) AS 'Payment descriptions', 'Farmer payment' AS 'Payment purpose'
TReportSQL.from: FROM contactcollectionpayment ccp INNER JOIN contact cnt ON cnt.cnt_uri = ccp.cnt_uri INNER JOIN collectionpayment clp ON ccp.clp_uri = clp.clp_uri INNER JOIN paymentmethod pmt ON ccp.ccp_paymentmethod = pmt.pmt_uri AND pmt.pmt_behaviour = 1
TReportSQL.where: WHERE IFNULL(clp.clp_transferred, 0) = 0 AND ccp.ccp_paydate IS NULL

TReportSQL.select: SELECT if (cnt.CNT_BNK_ACCNAME <> '', cnt.CNT_BNK_ACCNAME, cnt.CNT_LONGNAME) AS 'Account Name', cnt.CNT_BNK_ACCNUMBER AS 'Account Number', SUM(ccp.ccp_amountnett) AS 'Amount'
TReportSQL.from: FROM contactcollectionpayment ccp INNER JOIN contact cnt ON ccp.cnt_uri = cnt.CNT_URI INNER JOIN collectionpayment clp ON clp.clp_uri = ccp.clp_uri INNER JOIN paymentmethod pmt ON ccp.ccp_paymentmethod = pmt.pmt_uri AND pmt.pmt_behaviour = 1
TReportSQL.where: WHERE IFNULL(clp.clp_transferred,0) = 0 AND ccp.ccp_paydate IS NULL

TReportSQL.select: SELECT cnt.CNT_BNK_NAME AS 'Bank', cnt.CNT_BNK_BANKCODE AS 'Bank Code', cnt.CNT_BNK_BANKCODE AS 'Branch Code', ' ' AS 'Swift Code', if (cnt.CNT_BNK_ACCNAME <> '', cnt.CNT_BNK_ACCNAME, cnt.CNT_LONGNAME) AS 'Name of Client', cnt.CNT_BNK_ACCNUMBER AS 'Account Number', sum(ccp.ccp_amountnett) AS 'Amount'
TReportSQL.from: FROM contactcollectionpayment ccp INNER JOIN contact cnt ON ccp.cnt_uri = cnt.CNT_URI INNER JOIN collectionpayment clp ON clp.clp_uri = ccp.clp_uri INNER JOIN paymentmethod pmt ON ccp.ccp_paymentmethod = pmt.pmt_uri AND pmt.pmt_behaviour = 1
TReportSQL.where: WHERE IFNULL(clp.clp_transferred,0) = 0 AND ccp.ccp_paydate IS NULL

TReportSQL.select: SELECT 'MSISDN' AS 'Credit Identity String Type', IFNULL ( NULLIF( TRIM(TRAILING SUBSTRING_INDEX(REPLACE(REPLACE(cnt.CNT_PHONE,'/', ','),' ', ''), ',', -1) FROM SUBSTRING_INDEX(REPLACE( REPLACE(cnt.CNT_PHONE,',', ''),'/', ''),' ',1) ), ''), cnt.CNT_PHONE ) AS'Credit Identity String', if ((cnt.CNT_IDNR IS NULL) OR (cnt.CNT_IDNR = ''),'','National ID') AS 'Validation Identity String Type', cnt.CNT_IDNR AS 'Validation Identity String', SUM(ccp.ccp_amountnett) AS "Amount", cnt.CNT_LONGNAME AS 'Comment'
TReportSQL.from: FROM contactcollectionpayment ccp INNER JOIN contact cnt ON cnt.cnt_uri = ccp.cnt_uri INNER JOIN collectionpayment clp ON ccp.clp_uri = clp.clp_uri INNER JOIN paymentmethod pmt ON ccp.ccp_paymentmethod = pmt.pmt_uri AND pmt.pmt_behaviour = 1
TReportSQL.where: WHERE IFNULL(clp.clp_transferred, 0) = 0 AND ccp.ccp_paydate IS NULL

TReportSQL.select: SELECT prd.PRD_NAME AS 'Product name', CASE WHEN prd.prd_type = 1 THEN 'monetary' WHEN prd.prd_type = 2 THEN 'stock input' WHEN prd.prd_type = 3 THEN 'stock output' end AS 'Product type', crp.CRP_NAME AS 'Produce origin', IF (acc.acc_receiveonly = 1, 'Use', 'Stock') AS 'Account type', sum(afs.afs_balance) AS 'Account balance', CONCAT(IF (prd.prd_weight <> 1, CONCAT(prd.PRD_WEIGHT, ' '), ''), unt.UNT_NAME) AS 'Unit', max(afs.afs_lastupdate) AS 'Last transaction'
TReportSQL.from: FROM product prd INNER JOIN account acc ON acc.prd_uri = prd.prd_uri INNER JOIN unit unt ON unt.UNT_URI = prd.unt_uri left JOIN crop crp ON crp.CRP_URI = prd.crp_uri INNER JOIN accountforstaff afs ON afs.acc_uri = acc.acc_uri INNER JOIN personnel psn ON psn.psn_uri = afs.psn_uri
TReportSQL.where: WHERE ((prd.prd_uri = :prd_uri ) OR ( :prd_uri = 0)) AND (afs.afs_lastupdate BETWEEN :startdate AND :enddate )
TReportSQL.groupby: GROUP BY prd.PRD_NAME,prd.prd_type, crp.CRP_NAME, acc.acc_receiveonly, prd.PRD_WEIGHT, unt.UNT_NAME

TReportSQL.select: SELECT trn.trn_uri AS 'Transaction number', trn.trn_datetime AS 'Transaction date', trt.trt_desc AS 'Transaction type', IF(trt.trt_showsender=1, trn.trn_from_amount, null) AS 'Amount sent', IF(trt.trt_showsender=1,CONCAT(IF (prdfrom.prd_weight <> 1, CONCAT(prdfrom.PRD_WEIGHT, ' '), ''), untfrom.UNT_NAME, ' ', prdfrom.PRD_NAME), null) AS 'Sent description', IF(trt.trt_showsender=1,psnfrom.psn_longname, null) AS Sender, IF(trt.trt_showreceiver=1,IFNULL(psnto.psn_longname, 'n.a.'), null) AS Receiver, IF(trt.trt_showsender=1,accfrom.acc_name, null) AS 'Account from', IF(trt.trt_showreceiver=1,accto.acc_name, null) AS 'Account to', IF(trt.trt_showreceiver=1,trn.trn_to_amount, null) AS 'Amount received', IF(trt.trt_showreceiver=1,IFNULL(CONCAT(IF (prdto.prd_weight <> 1, CONCAT(prdto.PRD_WEIGHT, ' '), ''), untto.UNT_NAME, ' ', prdto.PRD_NAME), 'n.a.'), null) AS 'Received description', trn.trn_desc AS Description
TReportSQL.from: FROM transaction trn INNER JOIN transactiontype trt ON trn.trn_type=trt.trt_uri INNER JOIN product prdfrom ON prdfrom.prd_uri=trn.prd_from_uri INNER JOIN unit untfrom ON untfrom.unt_uri=prdfrom.unt_uri LEFT JOIN accountforstaff afsfrom ON afsfrom.afs_uri=trn.afs_from LEFT JOIN account accfrom ON afsfrom.acc_uri=accfrom.acc_uri LEFT JOIN personnel psnfrom ON afsfrom.psn_uri=psnfrom.psn_uri LEFT JOIN product prdto ON prdto.prd_uri=trn.prd_to_uri LEFT JOIN unit untto ON untto.unt_uri=prdto.unt_uri LEFT JOIN accountforstaff afsto ON afsto.afs_uri=trn.afs_to LEFT JOIN account accto ON afsto.acc_uri=accto.acc_uri LEFT JOIN personnel psnto ON afsto.psn_uri=psnto.psn_uri
TReportSQL.where: WHERE trn.trn_datetime BETWEEN :startdate AND :enddate

TReportSQL.select: SELECT cnt.CNT_BNK_NAME AS 'Beneficiary Bank Name', if (cnt.CNT_BNK_ACCNAME is NULL, cnt.CNT_SHORTNAME, cnt.CNT_LONGNAME) AS 'Beneficiary Account name', cnt.CNT_BNK_ACCNUMBER AS 'Beneficiary Account Number', SUM(ccp.ccp_amountnett) AS 'Amount', CAST(GROUP_CONCAT(dum.Narration SEPARATOR '-') AS CHAR)AS 'Description/Purpose', ' ' AS 'Swift code'
TReportSQL.from: FROM contactcollectionpayment ccp INNER JOIN contact cnt ON cnt.cnt_uri = ccp.cnt_uri INNER JOIN collectionpayment clp ON ccp.clp_uri = clp.clp_uri INNER JOIN ( SELECT clp_uri, GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT GPC_NUMBER SEPARATOR '-') AS Narration FROM groupcollectionpayment gcp INNER JOIN groupcollection gpc ON gcp.gpc_uri = gpc.gpc_uri GROUP BY clp_uri) dum ON dum.clp_uri = clp.clp_uri INNER JOIN paymentmethod pmt ON ccp.ccp_paymentmethod = pmt.pmt_uri AND pmt.pmt_behaviour = 1
TReportSQL.where: WHERE IFNULL(clp.clp_transferred, 0) = 0 AND ccp.ccp_paydate IS NULL

TReportSQL.select: SELECT DATE(trn.TRN_DATE) AS 'Training Date', tmd.TMD_DESC AS 'Training Module', GROUP_CONCAT(distinct grp_officialname) AS 'Group name', cnt.cnt_longname AS 'Farmer Name', att_desc AS 'Attendance type', atd_rep_name AS 'Representative name', if(atd_rep_gender IS NULL,cnt.CNT_GENDER, atd_rep_gender) Gender, if(atd_rep_dob IS NULL,YEAR(cnt.CNT_DOB),YEAR(atd_rep_dob )) AS 'Birth Year', if(atd_rep_dob IS NULL, YEAR(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP)- YEAR(cnt.CNT_DOB), YEAR(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP)- YEAR(atd_rep_dob)) AS Age , CASE WHEN if(atd_rep_dob IS NULL, YEAR(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP)- YEAR(cnt.CNT_DOB), YEAR(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP)- YEAR(atd_rep_dob)) < 18 then 'under 18' WHEN if(atd_rep_dob IS NULL, YEAR(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP)- YEAR(cnt.CNT_DOB), YEAR(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP)- YEAR(atd_rep_dob)) BETWEEN 18 AND 35 then '18-35' WHEN if(atd_rep_dob IS NULL, YEAR(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP)- YEAR(cnt.CNT_DOB) , YEAR(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP)- YEAR(atd_rep_dob)) BETWEEN 35 AND 55 then '36-55' ELSE if(cnt.CNT_DOB IS NOT NULL, 'above 55', NULL) END AS 'Age group', atd_rep_phone AS 'Representative phone number'
TReportSQL.from: FROM training trn INNER JOIN trainings trns ON trns.TRN_URI = trn.trn_uri INNER JOIN trainingmodule tmd ON tmd.tmd_uri=trn.tmd_uri INNER JOIN attendency atd ON atd.trn_uri=trn.trn_uri INNER JOIN attendancetype att ON att.att_uri = atd.att_uri INNER JOIN contact cnt on atd.CNT_URI=cnt.cnt_uri inner JOIN membership mmb ON mmb.cnt_uri = cnt.cnt_uri AND mmb.mem_end IS NULL AND mmb.mst_uri = 1 INNER JOIN `groups` grp ON grp.grp_uri = mmb.grp_uri AND grp.grp_uri = trns.GRP_URI
TReportSQL.where: WHERE ( tmd.TMD_URI= :tmd_uri or :tmd_uri = 0 ) AND trn.TRN_DATE BETWEEN :startdate AND :enddate
TReportSQL.orderby: ORDER BY DATE(trn.TRN_DATE) , tmd.TMD_DESC, 'group name', cnt.cnt_longname

TReportSQL.select: SELECT CNT_EPID 'Farmer id', CNT_SHORTNAME 'Farmer name', CNT_IDNR 'National id', case when CNT_GENDER = 'M' then 'Male' when CNT_GENDER = 'F' then 'Female' ELSE ' ' end AS 'Gender', date(CNT_DOB) 'Date of birth', CNT_PHONE 'Phone number', (SELECT TO_BASE64(CONCAT('<QR C=', :licidquoted ,' E="',CNT_EPID, '" T="', UNIX_TIMESTAMP(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP),'"/>'))) AS QRCODE, CAST( GROUP_CONCAT(GRP_OFFICIALNAME) AS CHAR) 'Farmer group', CAST( GROUP_CONCAT(GRP_CODE) AS CHAR) 'Group code', CAST( GROUP_CONCAT(GRP_DIVISION) AS CHAR) 'Ward'
TReportSQL.from: FROM contact cnt INNER JOIN membership mmb ON cnt.CNT_URI = mmb.CNT_URI INNER JOIN `groups` grp ON grp.GRP_URI = mmb.GRP_URI
TReportSQL.where: WHERE cnt.CNT_ACTIVE = 1 AND mmb.MST_URI = 1 AND date(mmb.MEM_END) IS NULL AND (grp.GRP_URI = :grp_uri OR :grp_uri = 0) AND cnt.cnt_uri not IN (SELECT isi.cnt_uri FROM issueditem isi INNER JOIN itemissue iss ON iss.iss_uri=isi.iss_uri INNER JOIN item itm ON itm.itm_uri=iss.itm_uri WHERE itm.itm_code='IDCARD' AND isi.itr_uri IS NULL) AND ( :org_uri = 0 OR (grp.grp_uri IN ( SELECT ogm.grp_uri FROM orggroupmembership ogm WHERE ( ogm.org_uri = :org_uri ) AND ( ogm.ogm_end is NULL ) )))
TReportSQL.groupby: GROUP BY CNT_EPID, CNT_SHORTNAME,CNT_IDNR,CNT_GENDER, date(CNT_DOB), CNT_PHONE

TReportSQL.select: SELECT date(HAR_DATE) 'Collection date', GRP_OFFICIALNAME 'Group name', cnt_epid 'EPID', CNT_LONGNAME 'Farmer name', HAR_AMOUNTDELIVERED 'Weight', CASE WHEN (HAR_TRACECODE LIKE '<t>%') THEN CONCAT_WS(" ", EXTRACTVALUE(HAR_TRACECODE, '//t//n'), EXTRACTVALUE(HAR_TRACECODE, '//t//d')) ELSE har.HAR_TRACECODE END AS 'TRACECODE1', CASE WHEN (HAR_TRACECODE2 LIKE '<t>%') THEN CONCAT_WS(" ", EXTRACTVALUE(HAR_TRACECODE2, '//t//n'), EXTRACTVALUE(HAR_TRACECODE2, '//t//d')) ELSE har.HAR_TRACECODE2 END AS 'TRACECODE2'
TReportSQL.from: FROM harvest har INNER JOIN groupcollection gpc ON har.GPC_URI = gpc.gpc_uri INNER JOIN `groups` grp ON grp.GRP_URI = gpc.GRP_URI INNER JOIN contact cnt ON cnt.cnt_uri = har.cnt_uri
TReportSQL.where:
WHERE date(HAR_DATE) between :startdate and :enddate AND gpc.GPC_STATUS = 'EX' AND (har.crp_uri = :crp_uri or :crp_uri = 0 ) AND (grp.grp_uri = :grp_uri OR :grp_uri = 0)
AND ( :org_uri = 0 OR (grp.grp_uri IN ( SELECT ogm.grp_uri FROM orggroupmembership ogm WHERE ( ogm.org_uri = :org_uri ) AND ( ogm.ogm_end is NULL ) )))

TReportSQL.select: SELECT crp_name 'Produce',SUM(har_amountdelivered) 'Kgs', date_format(har_date, '%x-%v') 'Week number', (SELECT CAST(GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT psn.psn_longname) AS CHAR) FROM staffgrouprole sgr INNER JOIN personnel psn ON psn.psn_uri = sgr.psn_uri WHERE sgr.grp_uri=grp.grp_uri AND sgr.rtt_uri=1) AS 'Extension officer', grp_officialname 'Group'
TReportSQL.from: FROM harvest har inner join crop crp on crp.crp_uri=har.crp_uri inner join contact cnt on cnt.cnt_uri = har.cnt_uri inner join groupcollection gpc on gpc.gpc_uri = har.gpc_uri inner join `groups` grp on grp.grp_uri = gpc.grp_uri
TReportSQL.where: WHERE har_date >= (SELECT SUBDATE((SELECT MAX(har_date) FROM harvest WHERE ( crp_uri = 1 OR 1 = 0 ) GROUP BY crp_uri LIMIT 1), 41 /*Days between the 6weeks interval*/)) AND (crp.crp_uri = :crp_uri OR :crp_uri = 0)

TReportSQL.select: SELECT intt.int_uri, intt.int_name 'Template name', ins.ins_uri, ins.ins_date 'Planned date', ins.ins_date_completion AS 'Completion date', psn.psn_longname 'Extension officer', grp.grp_uri, grp.grp_officialname 'Group name', EXTRACTVALUE(grp.grp_gpslocation, '/TCSLocation') AS 'Group GPS coordinates', EXTRACTVALUE(ins.ins_gpslocation, '/TCSLocation') AS "Survey GPS coordinates", itq.itq_uri, itq.itq_desc AS Question, ina.ina_uri, CONCAT(COALESCE(ina.ina_shorttext, ''), COALESCE(ina.ina_longtext, ''), COALESCE(ina.ina_amount, ''), COALESCE(DATE(ina.ina_date), '')) AS answer
TReportSQL.from: FROM inspection ins INNER JOIN ins_grp ON ins.ins_uri = ins_grp.ins_uri INNER JOIN `groups` grp on grp.grp_uri = ins_grp.grp_uri INNER JOIN inspectiontemplate intt ON intt.int_uri = ins.int_uri INNER JOIN templategroup tpg ON tpg.int_uri = ins.int_uri INNER JOIN inspectiontemplatequestion itq ON itq.tpg_uri = tpg.tpg_uri INNER JOIN questiontype qty ON qty.QTY_URI = itq.QTY_URI LEFT JOIN inspectionanswer ina ON ina.itq_uri = itq.itq_uri AND ina.ins_uri = ins.ins_uri INNER JOIN personnel psn ON psn.psn_uri = ins.PSN_URI
TReportSQL.where: WHERE ins.ins_status='E' AND qty.qty_code <> 'NONE' AND ins_type = 'G' AND ins.ins_date_completion BETWEEN :startdate AND :enddate /*group_filter , template filter, date range filter, transposition, */ AND ( :org_uri = 0 OR (grp.grp_uri IN ( SELECT ogm.grp_uri FROM orggroupmembership ogm WHERE ( ogm.org_uri = :org_uri ) AND ( ogm.ogm_end is NULL ) )))
TReportSQL.orderby: ORDER BY ins.ins_date, grp.grp_officialname, ins.ins_uri, tpg.tpg_order, itq.itq_order, ina.ina_uri

TReportSQL.select: SELECT cnt.cnt_longname AS 'Name', cnt.cnt_phone AS 'Mobile', cnt.cnt_idnr AS 'National I.D.', SUM(ccp.ccp_amountnett) AS 'Amount', '0'AS 'CarryOver', ' ' AS 'Notes'
TReportSQL.from: FROM contact cnt INNER JOIN contactcollectionpayment ccp ON ccp.cnt_uri = cnt.CNT_URI INNER JOIN collectionpayment clp ON clp.CLP_URI = ccp.clp_uri INNER JOIN paymentmethod pmt ON ccp.ccp_paymentmethod = pmt.pmt_uri AND pmt.pmt_behaviour = 2
TReportSQL.where: WHERE ccp.ccp_paydate IS NULL AND clp.CLP_TRANSFERRED IS NULL

TReportSQL.select: SELECT crp_name 'Produce', ' ' AS 'Sales Description', ' ' AS 'SKU', 'Inventory' AS 'TYPE', ' ' AS 'Sales Price / Rate', ' ' AS 'Tax on Sales', ' ' AS 'Price / Rate Includes Tax', ' ' AS 'Income account', ' ' AS 'Purchase Description', ' ' AS 'Purchase Cost', ' ' AS 'Tax on Purchases', ' ' AS 'Purchase Cost Includes Tax', ' ' AS 'Expense Account', sum(har_amountpaid) AS 'Quantity on Hand', ' ' AS 'Reorder Point', ' ' AS 'Inventory Asset Account', ' ' AS 'Quantity as-of DATE'
TReportSQL.from: FROM harvest har INNER JOIN crop crp ON har.CRP_URI = crp.CRP_URI INNER JOIN groupcollection gpc ON har.GPC_URI = gpc.GPC_URI
TReportSQL.where: WHERE date(HAR_DATE) between :startdate and :enddate AND gpc.GPC_STATUS = 'RP' AND (har.crp_uri = :crp_uri or :crp_uri = 0)

TReportSQL.select: SELECT cnt_longname 'Farmer Name', cnt_idnr 'National ID', crp_name 'Produce', sum(har.HAR_AMOUNTDELIVERED) AS'Total delivery', unt.UNT_LONGNAME 'Unit', har.har_price 'Price', sum(har.HAR_PAID) AS 'Amount Paid'
TReportSQL.from: FROM harvest har INNER JOIN contact cnt ON cnt.cnt_uri = har.cnt_uri INNER JOIN crop crp ON crp.crp_uri = har.crp_uri INNER JOIN unit unt ON crp.unt_collect_uri = unt.unt_URI
TReportSQL.where: WHERE (har.crp_uri = :crp_uri or :crp_uri = 0) AND har.HAR_DATE BETWEEN :startdate AND :enddate AND (har.har_price IS NOT NULL)

TReportSQL.select: SELECT MAX(crp_name) AS Produce , yielddate AS 'Yield Date', SUM(yield) AS 'Estimated Yield' FROM ( SELECT (SELECT crp.CRP_NAME FROM crop crp WHERE crp.CRP_URI= :crp_uri ) AS crp_name, ADDDATE(CURDATE(), INTERVAL @N := @N +1 DAY) AS yielddate, 0 AS yield FROM reportfield rf, reportfield, (SELECT @N:=0) dummyRowNum WHERE @N < (SELECT crp.CRP_REPLANTAFTER FROM crop crp WHERE crp.CRP_URI= :crp_uri ) UNION DISTINCT SELECT CRP_NAME,yielddate,SUM(yield) AS yield FROM (SELECT CRP_NAME, DATE_ADD(DATE(fld.FLD_START), INTERVAL eyd_day DAY) as yielddate, SUM(yieldbase.eyd_yield * (fld.fld_size) * (fld.fld_productivity/100)) AS yield FROM (SELECT crp.crp_uri,crp.CRP_NAME,crp.CRP_UNITSIZE,crp.crp_replantafter AS duration, eyd.eyd_day, eyd.eyd_yield FROM crop crp INNER JOIN estimated_yield eyd ON eyd.crp_uri=crp.crp_uri WHERE crp.crp_uri = :crp_uri ) yieldbase INNER JOIN field fld ON fld.crp_uri=yieldbase.crp_uri WHERE fld.FLD_START >= (DATE_SUB(DATE(CURDATE()), INTERVAL yieldbase.duration DAY)) AND fld.FLD_ESTEND >= CURDATE() AND fld.fld_end IS NULL GROUP BY CRP_NAME,yielddate ) base WHERE (yielddate) > CURDATE() GROUP BY CRP_NAME,yielddate ) test GROUP BY yielddate ORDER BY yielddate

SELECT itq.ITQ_QUESTIONNO AS 'Question Number', itq.itq_desc AS Question, CONCAT(COALESCE(ina.ina_shorttext, ''), COALESCE(ina.ina_longtext, ''), COALESCE(ina.ina_amount, ''), COALESCE(ina.ina_date, '')) AS Answer
TReportSQL.from: FROM inspection ins INNER JOIN inspectiontemplate intt ON intt.int_uri = ins.int_uri INNER JOIN ins_fld ON ins_fld.ins_uri=ins.ins_uri INNER JOIN FIELD fld ON fld.fld_uri = ins_fld.fld_uri INNER JOIN crop prd ON prd.crp_uri = fld.crp_uri INNER JOIN unit unt ON unt.unt_uri = prd.unt_uri INNER JOIN contact cnt ON cnt.cnt_uri = fld.cnt_uri INNER JOIN membership mbs ON mbs.cnt_uri = cnt.cnt_uri INNER JOIN `groups` grp ON mbs.grp_uri = grp.grp_uri INNER JOIN templategroup tpg ON tpg.int_uri = intt.int_uri INNER JOIN inspectiontemplatequestion itq ON itq.tpg_uri = tpg.tpg_uri INNER JOIN questiontype qty ON qty.qty_uri = itq.qty_uri INNER JOIN personnel psn ON psn.psn_uri = ins.PSN_URI LEFT OUTER JOIN inspectionanswer ina ON ina.itq_uri = itq.itq_uri AND ina.ins_uri = ins.ins_uri
TReportSQL.where: WHERE ins.ins_status='E' AND qty.qty_code <> 'NONE' AND mbs.mst_uri=1 AND COALESCE(mbs.mem_end, ins.ins_date) >= ins.ins_date AND COALESCE(mbs.mem_start, ins.ins_date) <= ins.ins_date AND ins.ins_date_completion BETWEEN :startdate AND :enddate AND (intt.int_uri= :int_uri ) AND (cnt.CNT_URI = :cnt_uri ) AND (grp.GRP_URI = :grp_uri OR :grp_uri = 0 ) AND ( :org_uri = 0 OR (grp.grp_uri IN ( SELECT ogm.grp_uri FROM orggroupmembership ogm WHERE ( ogm.org_uri = :org_uri ) AND ( ogm.ogm_end is NULL ) )))

TReportSQL.select: SELECT itq.ITQ_QUESTIONNO AS 'Question Number', itq.itq_desc AS Question, CONCAT(COALESCE(ina.ina_shorttext, ''), COALESCE(ina.ina_longtext, ''), COALESCE(ina.ina_amount, ''), COALESCE(ina.ina_date, '')) AS Answer
TReportSQL.from: FROM inspection ins INNER JOIN inspectiontemplate intt ON intt.int_uri = ins.int_uri INNER JOIN ins_cnt ON ins_cnt.ins_uri=ins.ins_uri INNER JOIN contact cnt ON cnt.cnt_uri = ins_cnt.cnt_uri LEFT JOIN membership mbs ON mbs.cnt_uri = cnt.cnt_uri AND mbs.mst_uri=1 LEFT JOIN `groups` grp ON mbs.grp_uri = grp.grp_uri AND mbs.mem_end IS NULL INNER JOIN templategroup tpg ON tpg.int_uri = intt.int_uri INNER JOIN inspectiontemplatequestion itq ON itq.tpg_uri = tpg.tpg_uri INNER JOIN questiontype qty ON qty.qty_uri = itq.qty_uri INNER JOIN personnel psn ON psn.psn_uri = ins.PSN_URI LEFT OUTER JOIN inspectionanswer ina ON ina.itq_uri = itq.itq_uri AND ina.ins_uri = ins.ins_uri
TReportSQL.where:
WHERE ins.ins_status='E' AND qty.qty_code <> 'NONE' AND COALESCE(mbs.mem_end, ins.ins_date) >= ins.ins_date AND COALESCE(mbs.mem_start, ins.ins_date) <= ins.ins_date AND (ins.ins_date_completion BETWEEN :startdate AND :enddate ) AND (intt.int_uri= :int_uri ) AND (cnt.CNT_URI = :cnt_uri ) AND (grp.GRP_URI = :grp_uri OR :grp_uri = 0 )
AND ( :org_uri = 0 OR (grp.grp_uri IN ( SELECT ogm.grp_uri FROM orggroupmembership ogm WHERE ( ogm.org_uri = :org_uri ) AND ( ogm.ogm_end is NULL ) )))

TReportSQL.select: SELECT trn.trn_uri, prd.PRD_NAME AS 'Product Name', acc.acc_name AS 'Account Name', DATE(trn.trn_datetime) AS 'Date Issued', cntdetails.cnt_epid AS 'Farmer EPID', cntdetails.CNT_LONGNAME AS 'Farmer Name', fld.fld_fieldno AS 'Field Number', fld.fld_name AS 'Field Name', trn.trn_desc AS 'Description', trn.trn_from_amount AS 'Quantity received', unt.UNT_NAME AS 'Unit of measure', trn.trn_to_amount / trn.trn_from_amount AS 'Price', trn.trn_to_amount AS 'Monetary Value', trt.trt_desc AS 'Transaction Type', psn.PSN_LONGNAME AS 'Extension Officer'
TReportSQL.from: FROM transaction trn LEFT JOIN transactiontype trt ON trn.trn_type=trt.trt_uri INNER JOIN trn_cnt trncnt ON trncnt.trn_uri = trn.trn_uri INNER JOIN ( SELECT cnt.CNT_URI, cnt.cnt_epid, cnt.CNT_LONGNAME, grp.GRP_NAME FROM `groups` grp INNER JOIN membership mem ON mem.grp_uri=grp.grp_uri AND mem.mst_uri=1 AND mem.mem_end IS NULL INNER JOIN contact cnt ON cnt.cnt_uri=mem.cnt_uri AND cnt.cnt_active=1 WHERE (grp.grp_uri = :grp_uri or :grp_uri = 0) AND ( :org_uri = 0 OR (grp.grp_uri IN ( SELECT ogm.grp_uri FROM orggroupmembership ogm WHERE ( ogm.org_uri = :org_uri ) AND ( ogm.ogm_end is NULL ) ))) ) cntdetails ON cntdetails.CNT_URI = trncnt.cnt_uri INNER JOIN trn_fld trnfld ON trnfld.trn_uri = trn.trn_uri INNER JOIN field fld ON fld.FLD_URI = trnfld.fld_uri INNER JOIN product prd ON prd.prd_uri=trn.prd_from_uri INNER JOIN unit unt ON unt.unt_uri=prd.unt_uri LEFT JOIN accountforstaff afs ON afs.afs_uri=trn.afs_from LEFT JOIN account acc ON afs.acc_uri=acc.acc_uri LEFT JOIN personnel psn ON afs.psn_uri=psn.psn_uri
TReportSQL.where: WHERE (( prd.prd_uri = :prd_uri ) OR ( :prd_uri = 0 )) AND (trn.trn_datetime BETWEEN :startdate AND :enddate ) AND (( psn.PSN_URI = :psn_uri ) OR ( :psn_uri = 0 ))
TReportSQL.groupby: GROUP BY trn.trn_uri, prd.PRD_NAME, DATE(trn.trn_datetime), cntdetails.cnt_epid, cntdetails.CNT_LONGNAME, fld.FLD_FIELDNO, fld.fld_name, trn.trn_desc, trn.trn_from_amount, trn.trn_to_amount, unt.UNT_NAME, psn.PSN_LONGNAME

TReportSQL.select: SELECT cntdetails.CNT_LONGNAME AS 'Farmer Name', fielddetails.FLD_FIELDNO AS 'Field number', fielddetails.fld_name AS 'Field name', crp.CRP_NAME AS 'Produce', fielddetails.FLD_START AS 'Date Planted', fielddetails.FLD_END AS 'Date Uprooted', fielddetails.trnToAmount AS 'Total Monetary Inputs Value', SUM(harvestdetails.HAR_PAID) AS 'Total Collection monetary value', SUM(harvestdetails.HAR_PAID) - SUM(fielddetails.trnToAmount) AS 'Gross Margin'
TReportSQL.from: FROM (SELECT har.CNT_URI, har.CRP_URI, SUM(har.HAR_PAID) AS HAR_PAID, har.har_tracecode2 FROM harvest har GROUP BY har.CNT_URI,har.CRP_URI,har.har_tracecode2) harvestdetails INNER JOIN (SELECT cnt.CNT_URI, cnt.cnt_epid, cnt.CNT_LONGNAME, grp.GRP_NAME FROM `groups` grp INNER JOIN membership mem ON mem.grp_uri=grp.grp_uri AND mem.mst_uri=1 and mem.mem_end IS NULL INNER JOIN contact cnt ON cnt.cnt_uri=mem.cnt_uri AND cnt.cnt_active=1 WHERE (( grp.GRP_URI = :grp_uri ) OR ( :grp_uri = 0 ) AND ( :org_uri = 0 OR (grp.grp_uri IN ( SELECT ogm.grp_uri FROM orggroupmembership ogm WHERE ( ogm.org_uri = :org_uri ) AND ( ogm.ogm_end is NULL ) )))) ) cntdetails ON cntdetails.CNT_URI = harvestdetails.CNT_URI INNER JOIN (SELECT fld.FLD_URI, fld.CNT_URI, DATE(fld.FLD_START) AS FLD_START , DATE(fld.FLD_END) AS FLD_END , fld.FLD_FIELDNO, fld.fld_name, psn.PSN_LONGNAME, SUM(trn.trn_to_amount) AS trnToAmount FROM transaction trn INNER JOIN trn_fld trnfld ON trnfld.trn_uri = trn.trn_uri INNER JOIN field fld ON fld.FLD_URI = trnfld.fld_uri INNER JOIN accountforstaff afs ON afs.afs_uri = trn.afs_from INNER JOIN personnel psn ON psn.PSN_URI = afs.psn_uri WHERE ((psn.PSN_URI = :psn_uri ) OR ( :psn_uri = 0 )) AND (trn.trn_datetime BETWEEN :startdate AND :enddate ) GROUP BY fld.FLD_URI, fld.FLD_START, fld.FLD_FIELDNO,psn.PSN_LONGNAME) fielddetails INNER JOIN crop crp ON crp.CRP_URI = harvestdetails.CRP_URI
TReportSQL.where: WHERE harvestdetails.har_tracecode2 = fielddetails.FLD_FIELDNO
TReportSQL.groupby: GROUP BY cntdetails.CNT_LONGNAME, cntdetails.CNT_URI, crp.CRP_NAME, fielddetails.FLD_URI, fielddetails.FLD_START, fielddetails.FLD_FIELDNO, fielddetails.trnToAmount, harvestdetails.HAR_PAID

TReportSQL.select:
SELECT DailySum.HarDate 'Date', DailySum.GroupName'Group name', DailySum.EPID, DailySum.FarmerName 'Farmer Name', DailySum.PhoneNumber 'Phone Number', DailySum.Produce 'Produce', DailySum.DaySum 'Current Delivery', TotalSum.TotalSum 'Total Cumulative Delivery', CONCAT('Dear ', DailySum.FarmerName,', 
', 'Your delivery for ', DailySum.HarDate, ' was ', DailySum.DaySum, ' ', DailySum.CropUnit,' of ', DailySum.Produce, '. 
', 'Total cumulative delivery as at ', DailySum.HarDate, ' is ', TotalSum.TotalSum,' ', DailySum.CropUnit, '. 
', 'Thank You ' ) AS 'SMS'
TReportSQL.from: FROM (SELECT cnt.CNT_URI, Date(har.HAR_DATE) 'HarDate', grp.GRP_OFFICIALNAME AS 'GroupName', cnt.cnt_epid AS 'EPID', cnt.CNT_LONGNAME AS 'FarmerName', cnt.cnt_phone AS 'PhoneNumber', crp.CRP_NAME AS 'Produce', unt.UNT_NAME AS 'CropUnit', SUM(har.HAR_AMOUNTPAID) 'DaySum' FROM harvest har INNER JOIN groupcollection gpc ON har.GPC_URI = gpc.gpc_uri INNER JOIN `groups` grp ON grp.GRP_URI = gpc.GRP_URI INNER JOIN contact cnt ON cnt.cnt_uri = har.cnt_uri INNER JOIN crop crp ON crp.CRP_URI = har.CRP_URI INNER JOIN unit unt ON unt.UNT_URI = crp.UNT_COLLECT_URI WHERE (DATE(har.HAR_DATE) = :har_date ) AND (( grp.GRP_URI = :grp_uri ) OR ( :grp_uri = 0 )) AND (( crp.CRP_URI = :crp_uri ) OR ( :crp_uri = 0 )) AND ( :org_uri = 0 OR (grp.grp_uri IN ( SELECT ogm.grp_uri FROM orggroupmembership ogm WHERE ( ogm.org_uri = :org_uri ) AND ( ogm.ogm_end is NULL ) ))) GROUP BY cnt.CNT_URI, Date(har.HAR_DATE), grp.GRP_URI, cnt.cnt_epid, cnt.CNT_LONGNAME, cnt.CNT_PHONE, crp.CRP_NAME, har.CNT_URI, crp.UNT_COLLECT_URI ORDER BY cnt.cnt_epid)DailySum INNER JOIN (SELECT har.CNT_URI, SUM(har.HAR_AMOUNTPAID) 'TotalSum' FROM harvest har WHERE (DATE(har.HAR_DATE) BETWEEN :startdate AND :har_date ) GROUP BY har.CNT_URI)TotalSum ON TotalSum.CNT_URI = DailySum.CNT_URI

TReportSQL.select: SELECT cnt_epid as 'EPID', cnt_shortname as 'Farmer name', prd.CRP_NAME as Produce, unt.UNT_NAME as 'Unit', ppt.ppt_desc as "Loan type", rpm.RPM_DESC AS 'loan name', date(har.har_date) as 'Collection date', har.HAR_AMOUNTDELIVERED as 'Total delivery', CONCAT(ROUND(har.HAR_PERCPAID, 0), ' %') as 'Percent paid', har.HAR_AMOUNTPAID as 'Amount paid', pppm.ppm_uri AS "Payment Id", IFNULL(DATE_FORMAT(max(pppm.ppm_lastrepayment),'%d/%m/%Y'),'never') as "Last repayed", sum(pppm.ppm_amount) as "Total amount", sum(pppm.ppm_balance) as "Amount open", sum(pppm.ppm_amount)-sum(pppm.ppm_balance) as "Repayed amount"
TReportSQL.from: FROM harvest har INNER JOIN contact cnt ON cnt.cnt_uri=har.cnt_uri AND cnt.cnt_active=1 LEFT JOIN membership mbs ON mbs.cnt_uri = cnt.cnt_uri AND mbs.mst_uri = 1 AND mbs.mem_end IS NULL LEFT JOIN `groups` grp ON mbs.grp_uri = grp.grp_uri AND mbs.mem_end IS NULL INNER JOIN crop prd ON prd.crp_uri=har.crp_uri INNER JOIN unit unt ON unt.unt_uri=prd.UNT_PAYMENT_URI LEFT JOIN postponedpayment pppm ON cnt.cnt_uri = pppm.cnt_uri INNER JOIN postponedpaymenttype ppt ON pppm.ppt_uri=ppt.ppt_uri LEFT JOIN repayment rpm ON pppm.ppm_uri = rpm.ppm_uri LEFT JOIN har_x_rpm hrpm ON har.HAR_URI = hrpm.har_uri AND rpm.rpm_uri = hrpm.rpm_uri
TReportSQL.where: WHERE (rpm.RPM_DATE >= har.har_date) AND (hrpm.hxr_datcr >= har.har_date) AND ( :org_uri = 0 OR (grp.grp_uri IN ( SELECT ogm.grp_uri FROM orggroupmembership ogm WHERE ( ogm.org_uri = :org_uri ) AND ( ogm.ogm_end is NULL ) )))
TReportSQL.groupby: GROUP BY cnt_epid, cnt_shortname, prd.CRP_NAME, unt.UNT_NAME, rpm.RPM_DESC, har.har_date, har.HAR_AMOUNTDELIVERED, har.HAR_PERCPAID, har.HAR_AMOUNTPAID, pppm.ppm_uri

TReportSQL.select: SELECT har.har_uri, cnt.cnt_epid, cnt.cnt_shortname AS Farmer, cnt.cnt_province AS ADMINLEVEL1, cnt.cnt_district AS ADMINLEVEL2, cnt.cnt_division AS ADMINLEVEL3, cnt.cnt_location AS ADMINLEVEL4, har.har_date AS "Date of Purchase", crp.crp_name AS Produce, CASE WHEN (har.HAR_TRACECODE LIKE '<t>%') THEN CONCAT_WS(" ", EXTRACTVALUE(har.HAR_TRACECODE, '//t//n'), EXTRACTVALUE(har.HAR_TRACECODE, '//t//d')) ELSE har.HAR_TRACECODE END AS 'TRACECODE1', cnt.CNT_BNK_ACCNUMBER AS "Account Number", har.har_amountpaid as Collected, har.har_price as pricenett, har.har_paid as amountnett, cqc.cqc_message, cqc.cqc_value, round(cqc.cqc_value * har.har_amountpaid,2) AS partvalue
TReportSQL.from: FROM contact cnt INNER JOIN harvest har ON cnt.cnt_uri = har.cnt_uri INNER JOIN crop crp ON crp.crp_uri = har.crp_uri INNER JOIN groupcollection gpc ON gpc.gpc_uri = har.gpc_uri INNER JOIN groupcollectionpayment gcp ON gcp.gpc_uri = gpc.gpc_uri LEFT JOIN collectionqualitycomponent cqc ON cqc.har_uri=har.har_uri
TReportSQL.where: WHERE har.crp_uri = :crp_uri AND har.HAR_DATE BETWEEN :startdate AND :enddate

TReportSQL.select: SELECT har.har_uri, cnt.cnt_epid, cnt.cnt_shortname AS Farmer, cnt.cnt_province AS ADMINLEVEL1, cnt.cnt_district AS ADMINLEVEL2, cnt.cnt_division AS ADMINLEVEL3, cnt.cnt_location AS ADMINLEVEL4, har.har_date AS "Date of Purchase", crp.crp_name AS Produce, CASE WHEN (har.HAR_TRACECODE LIKE '<t>%') THEN CONCAT_WS(" ", EXTRACTVALUE(har.HAR_TRACECODE, '//t//n'), EXTRACTVALUE(har.HAR_TRACECODE, '//t//d')) ELSE har.HAR_TRACECODE END AS 'TRACECODE1', har.har_amountpaid as Collected, har.har_price as pricenett, har.har_paid as amountnett, qmi.qmi_name, qms.qms_value
TReportSQL.from: FROM contact cnt INNER JOIN harvest har ON cnt.cnt_uri = har.cnt_uri INNER JOIN crop crp ON crp.crp_uri = har.crp_uri INNER JOIN groupcollection gpc ON gpc.gpc_uri = har.gpc_uri INNER JOIN groupcollectionpayment gcp ON gcp.gpc_uri = gpc.gpc_uri LEFT JOIN quality_measurement qms ON qms.har_uri=har.har_uri LEFT JOIN quality_measurementitem qmi ON qmi.qmi_uri=qms.qmi_uri
TReportSQL.where: WHERE har.crp_uri = :crp_uri AND har.HAR_DATE BETWEEN :startdate AND :enddate

TReportSQL.select: SELECT cnt.cnt_uri, grp.grp_code AS 'Group Code', grp.grp_officialname AS 'Group Name', cnt.cnt_epid AS epid, cnt.cnt_longname AS Farmer, x.csf_name AS 'Consent For', CASE WHEN x.csn_consent = 1 THEN 'Granted' WHEN x.csn_consent = 2 THEN 'Not granted' ELSE '' END AS 'Consent Granted', x.csn_date AS 'Consent Date', x.psn_name AS 'Consent Recorded by'
TReportSQL.from: FROM contact cnt INNER JOIN membership mbs ON cnt.cnt_uri = mbs.cnt_uri AND mbs.mst_uri = 1 INNER JOIN `groups` grp ON mbs.grp_uri = grp.grp_uri AND IFNULL(grp.grp_active, 0) = 1 LEFT JOIN (SELECT csn.cnt_uri, csn.csn_consent, csn.csn_date, psn.psn_name, csf.csf_name FROM consent csn INNER JOIN consent_for csf ON csn.csf_uri = csf.csf_uri INNER JOIN personnel psn ON csn.psn_uri = psn.psn_uri WHERE (csn.csf_uri = :csf_uri )) x ON cnt.cnt_uri = x.cnt_uri
TReportSQL.where: WHERE ( :org_uri = 0 OR (mbs.grp_uri IN ( SELECT ogm.grp_uri FROM orggroupmembership ogm WHERE ogm.org_uri = :org_uri ))) AND ( :grp_uri = 0 OR (mbs.grp_uri = :grp_uri ))

TReportSQL.select: SELECT groupcollection.GPC_DATE AS 'Collection Date',crop.CRP_NAME AS 'Produce Name',account.acc_name AS 'Account Name', CONCAT(groupcollection.GPC_AMOUNT,' ',unit.UNT_NAME) AS 'Collected',`groups`.GRP_NAME AS 'Group Name', CONCAT(( SELECT sys_value FROM sysparams WHERE sys_uri=63),'/', TO_BASE64(CONCAT((SELECT sys_value FROM sysparams WHERE sys_uri=64),'.',transaction.trn_guid))) AS "URL"
TReportSQL.from: FROM groupcollection INNER JOIN trn_gpc ON groupcollection.gpc_uri =trn_gpc.gpc_uri INNER JOIN TRANSACTION ON trn_gpc.trn_uri=transaction.trn_uri INNER JOIN `groups` ON groupcollection.GRP_URI=`groups`.GRP_URI INNER JOIN crop ON groupcollection.CRP_URI=crop.CRP_URI INNER JOIN unit ON crop.UNT_COLLECT_URI= unit.UNT_URI INNER JOIN accountforstaff ON transaction.afs_to = accountforstaff.afs_uri INNER JOIN account ON accountforstaff.acc_uri=account.acc_uri
TReportSQL.where: WHERE (groupcollection.GPC_STATUS IN ("RP", "PP")) AND (groupcollection.gpc_date BETWEEN :startdate AND :enddate ) AND (transaction.trn_type = 4)

TReportSQL.select: SELECT cnt.cnt_uri, grp.grp_code AS 'Group Code', grp.grp_officialname AS 'Group Name', cnt.cnt_epid AS epid, cnt.cnt_longname AS Farmer, x.csf_name AS 'Consent For', CASE WHEN x.csn_consent = 1 THEN 'Granted' WHEN x.csn_consent = 2 THEN 'Not granted' ELSE '' END AS 'Consent Granted', x.csn_date AS 'Consent Date', CASE WHEN x.csn_granted = -1 THEN 'Not Enrolled' WHEN x.csn_granted = 1 THEN 'Enrolled' ELSE '' END AS 'Enrolled', x.csn_modalities AS 'Modalities', x.psn_name AS 'Consent Recorded by'
TReportSQL.from: FROM contact cnt INNER JOIN membership mbs ON cnt.cnt_uri = mbs.cnt_uri AND mbs.mst_uri = 1 INNER JOIN `groups` grp ON mbs.grp_uri = grp.grp_uri AND IFNULL(grp.grp_active, 0) = 1 LEFT JOIN ( SELECT csn.cnt_uri, csn.csn_consent, csn.csn_date, psn.psn_name, csf.csf_name, EXTRACTVALUE(csn_data,'//TCommunityPassDataItem[@name="token"][1]/@success') AS csn_granted, EXTRACTVALUE(csn_data,'//TCommunityPassDataItem[@name="modalities"][1]/@value') AS csn_modalities FROM consent csn INNER JOIN consent_for csf ON csn.csf_uri = csf.csf_uri INNER JOIN personnel psn ON csn.psn_uri = psn.psn_uri WHERE (csn.csf_uri = ((SELECT EXTRACTVALUE(SYS_VALUE,'//Consent') FROM sysparams where sysparams.SYS_URI = 62) ))) x ON cnt.cnt_uri = x.cnt_uri
TReportSQL.where: WHERE ( :org_uri = 0 OR (mbs.grp_uri IN ( SELECT ogm.grp_uri FROM orggroupmembership ogm WHERE ogm.org_uri = :org_uri ))) AND ( :grp_uri = 0 OR (mbs.grp_uri = :grp_uri ))
